  240: 
  241: all() ->
  242:     [
  243:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  244:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  245:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  246:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
  247:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
  248:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
  249:     ] ++ simple_api_tests().
  250: 
  251: groups() ->
  252:     [
  253:      {'tlsv1.3', [], ((gen_api_tests() ++ tls13_group() ++
  254:                            handshake_paus_tests()) --
  255:                           [dh_params,
  256:                            new_options_in_handshake,
  257:                            handshake_continue_tls13_client,
  258:                            invalid_options])
  259:       ++ (since_1_2() -- [conf_signature_algs])},
  260:      {'tlsv1.2', [],  gen_api_tests() ++ since_1_2() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3() ++ [honor_client_cipher_order_tls12,
  261:                                                                                                 honor_server_cipher_order_tls12]},
  262:      {'tlsv1.1', [],  gen_api_tests() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3() ++ pre_1_2()},
  263:      {'tlsv1', [],  gen_api_tests() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3() ++ pre_1_2() ++ beast_mitigation_test()},
  264:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], gen_api_tests() -- [new_options_in_handshake, hibernate_server] ++
  265:           handshake_paus_tests() -- [handshake_continue_tls13_client] ++ pre_1_3()},
  266:      {'dtlsv1', [],  gen_api_tests() -- [new_options_in_handshake, hibernate_server] ++
  267:           handshake_paus_tests() -- [handshake_continue_tls13_client] ++ pre_1_3() ++ pre_1_2()}
  268:     ].
  269: 
  270: since_1_2() ->
  271:     [
  272:      conf_signature_algs,
  273:      no_common_signature_algs,
  274:      versions_option_based_on_sni
  275:     ].
  276: 
  277: pre_1_3() ->
  278:     [
  279:      default_reject_anonymous,
  280:      connection_information_with_srp
  281:     ].
  282: 
  283: pre_1_2() ->
  284:     [honor_server_cipher_order,
  285:      honor_client_cipher_order].
  286: 
  287: simple_api_tests() ->
  288:     [
  289:      invalid_keyfile,
  290:      invalid_certfile,
  291:      invalid_cacertfile,
  292:      invalid_dhfile,
  293:      invalid_options,
  294:      options_not_proplist,
  295:      options_whitebox,
  296:      format_error
  297:     ].
  298: 
  299: gen_api_tests() ->
  300:     [
  301:      peercert,
  302:      peercert_with_client_cert,
  303:      select_best_cert,
  304:      select_sha1_cert,
  305:      connection_information,
  306:      secret_connection_info,
  307:      keylog_connection_info,
  308:      versions,
  309:      new_options_in_handshake,
  310:      active_n,
  311:      dh_params,
  312:      hibernate_client,
  313:      hibernate_server,
  314:      listen_socket,
  315:      peername,
  316:      recv_active,
  317:      recv_active_once,
  318:      recv_active_n,
  319:      recv_no_active_msg,
  320:      recv_timeout,
  321:      recv_close,
  322:      controlling_process,
  323:      controller_dies,
  324:      controlling_process_transport_accept_socket,
  325:      close_with_timeout,
  326:      close_in_error_state,
  327:      call_in_error_state,
  328:      close_transport_accept,

  330:      der_input,

  336:      check_random_nonce,
  337:      cipher_listing,
  338:      export_key_materials,
  339:      legacy_prf
  340:     ].
  341: 
  342: handshake_paus_tests() ->
  343:     [
  344:      handshake_continue, 
  345:      handshake_continue_timeout,
  346:      handshake_continue_change_verify,
  347:      hello_client_cancel,
  348:      hello_server_cancel,
  349:      handshake_continue_tls13_client
  350:     ].
  351: 
  352: %% Only relevant for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0
  353: beast_mitigation_test() ->
  354:     [%% Original option
  355:      rizzo_disabled,
  356:      %% Same effect as disable
  357:      rizzo_zero_n, 
  358:      %% Same as default
  359:      rizzo_one_n_minus_one 
  360:     ].
  361: 
  362: tls13_group() ->
  363:     [
  364:      supported_groups,
  365:      honor_server_cipher_order_tls13,
  366:      honor_client_cipher_order_tls13,
  367:      client_options_negative_version_gap,
  368:      client_options_negative_dependency_version,
  369:      client_options_negative_dependency_stateless,
  370:      client_options_negative_dependency_role,
  371:      client_options_negative_early_data,
  372:      server_options_negative_early_data,
  373:      server_options_negative_version_gap,
  374:      server_options_negative_dependency_role,
  375:      server_options_negative_stateless_tickets_seed,
  376:      invalid_options_tls13,
  377:      cookie,
  378:      exporter_master_secret_consumed
  379:     ].
  380: 
  381: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  382:     catch crypto:stop(),
  383:     try crypto:start() of
  384: 	ok ->
  385: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  386: 	    ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0)
  387:     catch _:_ ->
  388: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  389:     end.
  390: 
  391: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  392:     ssl:stop(),
  393:     application:unload(ssl),
  394:     application:stop(crypto).
  395: 
  396: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  397:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  398:         true  ->
  399:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, 
  400:                                         [{client_type, erlang},
  401:                                          {server_type, erlang},
  402:                                          {version, GroupName}
  403:                                         | Config]);
  404:         false -> 
  405:             Config
  406:     end.
  407: 
  408: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  409:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  410: 
  411: init_per_testcase(handshake_continue_tls13_client, Config) ->
  412:     case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of
  413:         true ->
  414:             ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  415:             ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  416:             Config;
  417:         false ->
  418:             {skip, "Missing crypto support: TLS 1.3 not supported"}
  419:     end;
  420: init_per_testcase(connection_information_with_srp, Config) ->
  421:     PKAlg = proplists:get_value(public_keys, crypto:supports()),
  422:     case lists:member(srp, PKAlg) of
  423:         true ->
  424:             Config;
  425:         false ->
  426:             {skip, "Missing SRP crypto support"}
  427:     end;
  428: init_per_testcase(conf_signature_algs, Config) ->
  429:     case ssl_test_lib:appropriate_sha(crypto:supports()) of
  430:         sha256 ->
  431:             ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  432:             ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  433:             Config;
  434:         sha ->
  435:             {skip, "Tests needs certs with sha256"}
  436:     end;
  437: init_per_testcase(check_random_nonce, Config) ->
  438:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  439:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  440:     Config;
  441: init_per_testcase(select_best_cert, Config) ->
  442:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  443:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  444:     %% We need to make sure TLS-1.3 can be supported as
  445:     %% want to generate a TLS-1.3 specific certificate that will not
  446:     %% be chosen
  447:     case Version of
  448:         'tlsv1.2' ->
  449:               case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of
  450:                   true ->
  451:                       Config;
  452:                   false ->
  453:                       {skip, "Crypto does not support EDDSA"}
  454:               end;
  455:         _ ->
  456:             Config
  457:     end;
  458: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  459:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  460:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  461:     Config.
  462: 
  463: end_per_testcase(internal_active_n, _Config) ->
  464:     application:unset_env(ssl, internal_active_n);
  465: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
  466:     Config.
  467: 
  468: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  469: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  470: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  471: peercert() ->
  472:     [{doc,"Test API function peercert/1"}].
  473: peercert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  474:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  475:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  476:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  477: 
  478:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  479: 					{from, self()},
  480: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  481: 			   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  482:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  483:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  484: 					{host, Hostname},
  485: 			   {from, self()},
  486: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  487: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  488: 
  489:     CertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerOpts),
  490:     [{'Certificate', BinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CertFile),
  491: 
  492:     ServerMsg = {error, no_peercert},
  493:     ClientMsg = {ok, BinCert},
  494: 
  495:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  496: 
  497:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
  498: 
  499:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  500:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  501: 
  502: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  503: 
  504: peercert_with_client_cert() ->
  505:     [{doc,"Test API function peercert/1"}].
  506: peercert_with_client_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  507:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  508:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  509:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  510: 
  511:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  512: 					{from, self()},
  513: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  514: 			   {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  515:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  516:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  517: 					{host, Hostname},
  518: 			   {from, self()},
  519: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  520: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  521: 
  522:     ServerCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerOpts),
  523:     [{'Certificate', ServerBinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ServerCertFile),
  524:      ClientCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ClientOpts),
  525:     [{'Certificate', ClientBinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ClientCertFile),
  526: 
  527:     ServerMsg = {ok, ClientBinCert},
  528:     ClientMsg = {ok, ServerBinCert},
  529: 
  530:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  531: 
  532:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
  533: 
  534:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  535:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  536: 
  537: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  538: select_best_cert() ->
  539:     [{doc,"Basic test of the certs_keys option."}].
  540: 
  541: select_best_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  542:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  543:     Conf = test_config(Version, Config),
  544:     lists:foreach(
  545:       fun({#{server_config := SConfig,
  546:              client_config := CConfig},
  547:            {client_peer, CExpected},
  548:            {server_peer, SExpected}}) ->
  549:               selected_peer(CExpected, SExpected,
  550:                             ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(CConfig, Config),
  551:                             ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SConfig, Config),
  552:                             Conf)
  553:       end, Conf).
  554: 
  555: 
  556: 
  557: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  558: select_sha1_cert() ->
  559:     [{doc,"Use cert signed with rsa and sha1"}].
  560: 
  561: select_sha1_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  562:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  563:     TestConfRSA =
  564:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  565:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  566:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  567:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  568:                                                              {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  569:                                           peer =>  [{digest, sha}, {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]
  570:                                          },
  571:                                     client_chain =>
  572:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  573:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
  574:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  575:                                                              {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  576:                                           peer => [{digest, sha},
  577:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}),
  578: 
  579:     TestConfECDSA =
  580:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  581:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  582:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}],
  583:                                           intermediates =>
  584:                                               [[{digest, sha},
  585:                                                 {key,{namedCurve, secp256r1}}]],
  586:                                           peer =>  [{digest, sha},
  587:                                                     {key,{namedCurve, secp256r1}}]
  588:                                          },
  589:                                     client_chain =>
  590:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  591:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}],
  592:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  593:                                                              {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}]],
  594:                                           peer => [{digest, sha},
  595:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}]}}),
  596:     test_sha1_cert_conf(Version, TestConfRSA, TestConfECDSA, Config).
  597: 
  598: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  599: connection_information() ->
  600:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/1"}].
  601: connection_information(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  602:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  603:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  604:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  605:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  606: 					{from, self()},
  607: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_information_result, []}},
  608: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
  609: 
  610:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  611:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  612: 					{host, Hostname},
  613: 			   {from, self()},
  614: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, connection_information_result, []}},
  615: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  616: 
  617:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  618: 
  619:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  620: 
  621:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  622:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  623: 
  624: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  625: connection_information_with_srp() ->
  626:     [{doc,"Test the result of API function ssl:connection_information/1"
  627:           "includes srp_username."}].
  628: connection_information_with_srp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  629:     run_conn_info_srp_test(srp_anon, 'aes_128_cbc', Config).
  630: 
  631: run_conn_info_srp_test(Kex, Cipher, Config) ->
  632:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  633:     TestCiphers = ssl_test_lib:test_ciphers(Kex, Cipher, Version),
  634: 
  635:     case TestCiphers of
  636:         [] ->
  637:             {skip, {not_sup, Kex, Cipher, Version}};
  638:         [TestCipher | _T] ->
  639:             do_run_conn_info_srp_test(TestCipher, Version, Config)
  640:     end.
  641: 
  642: do_run_conn_info_srp_test(ErlangCipherSuite, Version, Config) ->
  643:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  644: 
  645:     SOpts = [{user_lookup_fun, {fun ssl_test_lib:user_lookup/3, undefined}}],
  646:     COpts = [{verify, verify_none}, {srp_identity, {"Test-User", "secret"}}],
  647: 
  648:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts, Config),
  649:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts, Config),
  650: 
  651:     ?CT_LOG("Erlang Cipher Suite is: ~p~n", [ErlangCipherSuite]),
  652: 
  653:     Server =
  654:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  655:                                    {from, self()},
  656:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, check_srp_in_connection_information, [<<"Test-User">>, server]}},
  657:                                    {options, [{versions, [Version]}, {ciphers, [ErlangCipherSuite]} |
  658:                                               ServerOpts]}]),
  659:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  660:     Client =
  661:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  662:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  663:            {host, Hostname},
  664:            {from, self()},
  665:            {mfa, {?MODULE, check_srp_in_connection_information, [<<"Test-User">>, client]}},
  666:            {options, [{versions, [Version]}, {ciphers, [ErlangCipherSuite]} |
  667:                       ClientOpts]}]),
  668: 
  669:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  670: 
  671:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  672:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  673: 
  674: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  675: 
  676: secret_connection_info() ->
  677:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/2"}].
  678: secret_connection_info(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  679:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  680:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  681:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  682: 
  683:     Server =
  684:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  685:                                    {from, self()},
  686:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, secret_connection_info_result, []}},
  687:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  688:     
  689:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  690:     Client =
  691:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  692:                                    {host, Hostname},
  693:                                    {from, self()},
  694:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, secret_connection_info_result, []}},
  695:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer} |ClientOpts]}]),
  696:     
  697:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  698: 			   
  699:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, true, Client, true),
  700:     
  701:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  702:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  703: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  704: keylog_connection_info() ->
  705:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/2"}].
  706: keylog_connection_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  707:     keylog_connection_info(Config, true),
  708:     keylog_connection_info(Config, false).
  709: keylog_connection_info(Config, KeepSecrets) ->
  710:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  711:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  712:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  713: 
  714:     Server =
  715:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  716:                                    {from, self()},
  717:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, keylog_connection_info_result, [KeepSecrets]}},
  718:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer}, {keep_secrets, KeepSecrets} | ServerOpts]}]),
  719: 
  720:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  721:     Client =
  722:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  723:                                    {host, Hostname},
  724:                                    {from, self()},
  725:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, keylog_connection_info_result, [KeepSecrets]}},
  726:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer}, {keep_secrets, KeepSecrets} |ClientOpts]}]),
  727: 
  728:     ?CT_LOG("KeepSecrets ~p Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [KeepSecrets, Client, Server]),
  729: 
  730:     ServerKeylog = receive
  731:                        {Server, {ok, Keylog}} ->
  732:                            Keylog;
  733:                        {Server, ServerError} ->
  734:                            ct:fail({server, ServerError})
  735:                    after 5000 ->
  736:                            ct:fail({server, timeout})
  737:                    end,
  738: 
  739:     receive
  740:         {Client, {ok, ServerKeylog}} ->
  741:             ok;
  742:         {Client, {ok, ClientKeylog}} ->
  743:             ct:fail({mismatch, {ServerKeylog, ClientKeylog}});
  744:         {Client, ClientError} ->
  745:             ct:fail({client, ClientError})
  746:     after 5000 ->
  747:             ct:fail({client, timeout})
  748:     end,
  749: 
  750:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  751:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  752: 
  753: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  754: dh_params() ->
  755:     [{doc,"Test to specify DH-params file in server."}].
  756: 
  757: dh_params(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  758:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  759:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  760:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  761:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam.pem"),
  762:     Ciphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.2'),
  763:                                        [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  764:                                                           (srp_anon) -> false;
  765:                                                           (srp_dss) -> false;
  766:                                                           (_) -> true end}]),
  767: 
  768:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  769:     
  770:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  771: 					{from, self()}, 
  772: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  773: 			   {options, [{dhfile, DHParamFile}, {ciphers, Ciphers} | ServerOpts]}]),
  774:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  775:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  776: 					{host, Hostname},
  777: 			   {from, self()}, 
  778: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  779: 			   {options,
  780: 			    [{ciphers,[{dhe_rsa,aes_256_cbc,sha}]} | 
  781: 				       ClientOpts]}]),
  782:     
  783:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  784:     
  785:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  786:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  787: 
  788: 
  789: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  790: invalid_dhfile() ->
  791:     [{doc,"Test to check invalid DH-params file in server."}].
  792: invalid_dhfile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  793:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  794:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  795:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  796:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam-invalid.pem"),
  797: 
  798:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  799: 
  800:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  801:                                               {from, self()},
  802:                                               {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  803:                                                      send_recv_result_active,
  804:                                                      []}},
  805:                                                {options, [{dhfile, DHParamFile}
  806:                                                           | ServerOpts]}]),
  807:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  808:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  809:                                               {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
  810:                                               {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  811:                                                      send_recv_result_active,
  812:                                                      []}},
  813:                                               {options, [{ciphers,
  814:                                                           [{dhe_rsa,
  815:                                                             aes_256_cbc, sha}]}
  816:                                                          | ClientOpts]}]),
  817: 
  818:     %% assert server error
  819:     [{Server, {error, {options, {dhfile, DHParamFile,
  820:                                  {error, {asn1,
  821:                                           {{invalid_value, 0}, _Stack}}}}}}}] =
  822:         ssl_test_lib:get_result([Server]),
  823: 
  824:     %% assert client error
  825:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, {error, closed}),
  826: 
  827:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  828:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  829: 
  830: 
  831: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  832: conf_signature_algs() ->
  833:     [{doc,"Test to set the signature_algs option on both client and server"}].
  834: conf_signature_algs(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  835:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  836:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  837:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  838:     Server = 
  839: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  840: 				   {from, self()}, 
  841: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  842: 				   {options,  [{active, false}, {signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]}, 
  843:                                                {versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  844:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  845:     Client = 
  846: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  847: 				   {host, Hostname},
  848: 				   {from, self()}, 
  849: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  850: 				   {options, [{active, false}, {signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]},
  851:                                               {versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ClientOpts]}]),
  852:     
  853:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  854:     
  855:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  856:     
  857:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  858:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  859: 
  860: 
  861: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  862: no_common_signature_algs()  ->
  863:     [{doc,"Set the signature_algs option so that there client and server does not share any hash sign algorithms"}].
  864: no_common_signature_algs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  865:     
  866:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  867:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  868: 
  869:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  870: 
  871: 
  872:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  873: 					      {from, self()},
  874: 					      {options, [{signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]}
  875: 							 | ServerOpts]}]),
  876:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  877:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  878:                                               {host, Hostname},
  879:                                               {from, self()},
  880:                                               {options, [{signature_algs, [{sha384, rsa}]}
  881:                                                          | ClientOpts]}]),
  882:     
  883:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, insufficient_security).
  884: 
  885: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  886: handshake_continue() ->
  887:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3"}].
  888: handshake_continue(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  889:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  890:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  891:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  892: 
  893:     Server =
  894:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  895:                                    {host, Hostname},
  896:                                    {from, self()},
  897:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  898:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true},
  899:                                                                             {verify, verify_peer},
  900:                                                                        {handshake, hello} | ServerOpts
  901:                                                                       ],
  902:                                                                       Config)},
  903:                                    {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}
  904:                                   ]),
  905:     
  906:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  907: 
  908:     Client =
  909:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  910:                                    {host, Hostname},
  911:                                    {from, self()},
  912:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  913:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
  914:                                                                        {verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts
  915:                                                                       ],
  916:                                                                       Config)},
  917:                                    {continue_options,  [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
  918:      
  919:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  920:     
  921:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  922:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  923: 
  924: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  925: handshake_continue_tls13_client() ->
  926:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3 with fixed TLS 1.3 client"}].
  927: handshake_continue_tls13_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  928:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  929:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  930:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  931:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  932:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  933:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  934:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  935:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),
  936:     Server =
  937:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  938:                                    {from, self()},
  939:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  940:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true},
  941:                                                                        {verify, verify_peer},
  942:                                                                        {ciphers, SCiphers},
  943:                                                                       {handshake, hello} | ServerOpts
  944:                                                                       ],
  945:                                                                      Config)},
  946:                                    {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}
  947:                                   ]),
  948: 
  949:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  950: 
  951:     DummyTicket =
  952:         <<131,116,0,0,0,5,100,0,4,104,107,100,102,100,0,6,115,104,97,51,
  953:           56,52,100,0,3,112,115,107,109,0,0,0,48,150,90,38,127,26,12,5,
  954:           228,180,235,229,214,215,27,236,149,182,82,14,140,50,81,0,150,
  955:           248,152,180,193,207,80,52,107,196,200,2,77,4,96,140,65,239,205,
  956:           224,125,129,179,147,103,100,0,3,115,110,105,107,0,25,112,114,
  957:           111,117,100,102,111,111,116,46,111,116,112,46,101,114,105,99,
  958:           115,115,111,110,46,115,101,100,0,6,116,105,99,107,101,116,104,6,
  959:           100,0,18,110,101,119,95,115,101,115,115,105,111,110,95,116,105,
  960:           99,107,101,116,98,0,0,28,32,98,127,110,83,249,109,0,0,0,8,0,0,0,
  961:           0,0,0,0,5,109,0,0,0,113,112,154,74,26,27,0,111,147,51,110,216,
  962:           43,45,4,100,215,152,195,118,96,22,34,1,184,170,42,166,238,109,
  963:           187,138,196,147,102,205,116,83,241,174,227,232,156,148,60,153,3,
  964:           175,128,115,192,36,103,191,239,58,222,192,172,190,239,92,8,131,
  965:           195,0,217,187,222,143,104,6,86,53,93,27,218,198,205,138,223,202,
  966:           11,55,168,104,6,219,228,217,157,37,52,205,252,165,135,167,116,
  967:           216,172,231,222,189,84,97,0,8,106,108,88,47,114,48,116,0,0,0,0,
  968:           100,0,9,116,105,109,101,115,116,97,109,112,98,93,205,0,44>>,
  969: 
  970:     %% Send dummy session ticket to trigger sending of pre_shared_key and
  971:     %% psk_key_exchange_modes extensions.
  972:     Client =
  973:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  974:                                    {host, Hostname},
  975:                                    {from, self()},
  976:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  977:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
  978:                                                                        {session_tickets, manual},
  979:                                                                        {use_ticket, [DummyTicket]},
  980:                                                                        {versions, ['tlsv1.3',
  981:                                                                                    'tlsv1.2',
  982:                                                                                    'tlsv1.1',
  983:                                                                                    'tlsv1'
  984:                                                                                   ]},
  985:                                                                        {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3')},
  986:                                                                        {verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts
  987:                                                                       ],
  988:                                                                       Config)},
  989:                                    {continue_options,  proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ClientOpts)}]),
  990: 
  991:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  992: 
  993:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  994:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).

  996: %%------------------------------------------------------------------
  997: handshake_continue_timeout() ->
  998:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3 with short timeout"}].
  999: handshake_continue_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1000:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1001:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1002:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1003: 
 1004:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1005:                                         {from, self()},
 1006:                                         {timeout, 1},
 1007:                                         {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true}, {handshake, hello},
 1008:                                                                             {verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts],
 1009:                                                                            Config)},
 1010:                                         {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}
 1011:                                        ]),
 1012: 
 1013:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1014: 
 1015: 
 1016:     ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1017:                                      {host, Hostname},
 1018:                                      {from, self()},
 1019:                                      {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1020:     
 1021:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, {error,timeout}),
 1022:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
 1023: 
 1024: handshake_continue_change_verify() ->
 1025:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue with updated verify option. "
 1026:       "Use a verification that will fail to make sure verification is run"}].
 1027: handshake_continue_change_verify(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1028:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1029:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1030:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1031: 
 1032:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 1033:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1034:                 {from, self()},
 1035:                 {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(
 1036:                             [{handshake, hello},
 1037:                              {verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts], Config)},
 1038:                 {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}]),
 1039: 
 1040:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1041: 
 1042:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
 1043:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1044:                 {host, Hostname},
 1045:                 {from, self()},
 1046:                 {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(
 1047:                             [{handshake, hello},
 1048:                              {server_name_indication, "foobar"},
 1049:                              {verify, verify_none}
 1050:                             | ClientOpts], Config)},
 1051:                 {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1052:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client,  handshake_failure).
 1053: 
 1054: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1055: hello_client_cancel() ->
 1056:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_cancel/1 on the client side"}].
 1057: hello_client_cancel(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1058:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1059:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1060:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1061: 
 1062:     Server =
 1063:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1064:                                    {host, Hostname},
 1065:                                    {from, self()},
 1066:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
 1067:                                                                        {verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts], Config)},
 1068:                                    {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1069:     
 1070:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1071: 
 1072:     %% That is ssl:handshake_cancel returns ok
 1073:     {connect_failed, ok} =
 1074:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1075:                                    {host, Hostname},
 1076:                                    {from, self()},
 1077:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello}
 1078:                                                                       | ClientOpts], Config)},
 1079:                                    {continue_options, cancel}]),
 1080:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, user_canceled).
 1081: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------

 1083:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_cancel/1 on the server side"}].
 1084: hello_server_cancel(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

 1086:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),

 1088: 
 1089:     Server =
 1090:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1091:                                    {from, self()},
 1092:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
 1093:                                                                        {verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts
 1094:                                                                       ], Config)},
 1095:                                    {continue_options, cancel}]),
 1096:     
 1097:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1098: 
 1099:     ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1100:                                      {host, Hostname},
 1101:                                      {from, self()}, 
 1102:                                      {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
 1103:                                                                          {verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts
 1104:                                                                         ], Config)},
 1105:                                      {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ClientOpts)}]),
 1106:     
 1107:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok).

 1109: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1110: versions() ->
 1111:     [{doc,"Test API function versions/0"}].
 1112: 
 1113: versions(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1114:     [_|_] = Versions = ssl:versions(),
 1115:     ?CT_LOG("~p~n", [Versions]).
 1116: 
 1117: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1118: 
 1119: versions_option_based_on_sni() ->
 1120:     [{doc,"Test that SNI versions option is selected over default versions"}].
 1121: 
 1122: versions_option_based_on_sni(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1123:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1124:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1125:     TestVersion = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 1126:     {Version, Versions} = test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni(TestVersion),
 1127:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1128:     Ciphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, TestVersion),
 1129:                                        [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa) -> false;
 1130:                                                           (srp_dss) -> false;
 1131:                                                           (_) -> true
 1132:                                                        end}]),
 1133: 
 1134:     SNI = net_adm:localhost(),
 1135:     Fun = fun(ServerName) ->
 1136:               case ServerName of
 1137:                   SNI ->
 1138:                       [{versions, [Version]}, {ciphers, Ciphers} | ServerOpts];
 1139:                   _ ->
 1140:                       ServerOpts
 1141:               end
 1142:           end,
 1143: 
 1144:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1145: 					{from, self()},
 1146: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, protocol_version_check, [Version]}},
 1147: 					{options, [{sni_fun, Fun},
 1148:                                                    {versions, Versions} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1149:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1150:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1151: 					{host, Hostname},
 1152: 					{from, self()},
 1153: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1154: 					{options, [{server_name_indication, SNI}, {versions, Versions},
 1155:                                                    {ciphers, Ciphers}
 1156:                                                   | ClientOpts]}]),
 1157: 
 1158:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1159:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1160:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1161: 
 1162: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1163: %% Test case adapted from gen_tcp_misc_SUITE.
 1164: active_n() ->
 1165:     [{doc,"Test {active,N} option"}].
 1166: 
 1167: active_n(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1168:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1169:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1170:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(node()),
 1171:     Host = net_adm:localhost(),
 1172:     N = 3,
 1173:     LS = ok(ssl:listen(Port, [{active,N}|ServerOpts])),
 1174:     [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(LS, [active])),
 1175:     active_n_common(LS, N),
 1176:     Self = self(),
 1177:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 1178:         S0 = ok(ssl:transport_accept(LS)),
 1179:         {ok, S} = ssl:handshake(S0),
 1180:         ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 1181:         [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 1182:         ssl:controlling_process(S, Self),
 1183:         Self ! {server, S}
 1184:     end),
 1185:     C = ok(ssl:connect(Host, Port, [{active,N}|ClientOpts])),
 1186:     [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(C, [active])),
 1187:     S = receive
 1188:         {server, S0} -> S0
 1189:     after
 1190:         1000 ->
 1191:             exit({error, connect})
 1192:     end,
 1193:     active_n_common(C, N),
 1194:     active_n_common(S, N),
 1195:     ok = ssl:setopts(C, [{active,N}]),
 1196:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 1197:     ReceiveMsg = fun(Socket, Msg) ->
 1198:         receive
 1199:             {ssl,Socket,Msg} ->
 1200:                 ok;
 1201:             {ssl,Socket,Begin} ->
 1202:                 receive
 1203:                     {ssl,Socket,End} ->
 1204:                         Msg = Begin ++ End,
 1205:                         ok
 1206:                 after 1000 ->
 1207:                     exit(timeout)
 1208:                 end
 1209:         after 1000 ->
 1210:             exit(timeout)
 1211:         end
 1212:     end,
 1213:     repeat(3, fun(I) ->
 1214:         Msg = "message "++integer_to_list(I),
 1215:         ok = ssl:send(C, Msg),
 1216:         ReceiveMsg(S, Msg),
 1217:         ok = ssl:send(S, Msg),
 1218:         ReceiveMsg(C, Msg)
 1219:     end),
 1220:     receive
 1221:         {ssl_passive,S} ->
 1222:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active]))
 1223:     after
 1224:         1000 ->
 1225:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1226:     end,
 1227:     receive
 1228:         {ssl_passive,C} ->
 1229:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(C, [active]))
 1230:     after
 1231:         1000 ->
 1232:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1233:     end,
 1234:     LS2 = ok(ssl:listen(0, [{active,0}])),
 1235:     receive
 1236:         {ssl_passive,LS2} ->
 1237:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(LS2, [active]))
 1238:     after
 1239:         1000 ->
 1240:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1241:     end,
 1242:     ok = ssl:close(LS2),
 1243:     ok = ssl:close(C),
 1244:     ok = ssl:close(S),
 1245:     ok = ssl:close(LS),
 1246:     ok.
 1247: 
 1248: hibernate_client() ->
 1249:     [{doc,"Check that an SSL connection on client side that is started with "
 1250:       "option hibernate_after indeed hibernates after inactivity"}].
 1251: 
 1252: hibernate_client(Config) ->
 1253:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1254:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1255:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1256:     StartServerOpts = [return_socket, {node, ServerNode},
 1257:                        {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 1258:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 1259:                        {options, [{hibernate_after, infinity} | ServerOpts]}],
 1260:     StartClientOpts = [return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {host, Hostname},
 1261:                        {from, self()},
 1262:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1263:     [ok = hibernate_helper(?config(version, Config), false,
 1264:                            StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1265:                            ServerOpts, ClientOpts, T, infinity) ||
 1266:         T <- [1000, 0, 1]].
 1267: 
 1268: hibernate_server() ->
 1269:     [{doc,"Check that an SSL connection on server side that is started with "
 1270:       "option hibernate_after indeed hibernates after inactivity."
 1271:       "Note: for DTLS test will not be stable, because cookie secret refresh "
 1272:       "mechanism might disturb hibernation of a server process."}].
 1273: hibernate_server(Config) ->
 1274:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1275:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1276:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1277:     StartServerOpts = [return_socket, {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1278:                        {from, self()},
 1279:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1280:     StartClientOpts = [return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {host, Hostname},
 1281:                        {from, self()},
 1282:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1283:     [ok = hibernate_helper(?config(version, Config), true,
 1284:                            StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1285:                            ServerOpts, ClientOpts, infinity, T) ||
 1286:         T <- [1000, 0, 1]].
 1287: 
 1288: hibernate_helper(Version, CheckServer, StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1289:                  ServerOpts0, ClientOpts0,
 1290:                  ClientHibernateAfter, ServerHibernateAfter) ->
 1291:     AllServerOpts = StartServerOpts ++
 1292:         [{options, [{hibernate_after, ServerHibernateAfter} | ServerOpts0]}],
 1293:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(AllServerOpts),
 1294:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1295:     AllClientOpts = StartClientOpts ++
 1296:         [{port, Port},
 1297:          {options, [{hibernate_after, ClientHibernateAfter} | ClientOpts0]}],
 1298:     {Client, #sslsocket{pid = [ClientReceiverPid | ClientPotentialSenderPid]}} =
 1299:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(AllClientOpts),
 1300:     Results = ssl_test_lib:get_result([Client, Server]),
 1301:     {ok, ServerAcceptSocket} = proplists:get_value(Server, Results),
 1302:     ok = proplists:get_value(Client, Results),
 1303:     #sslsocket{pid = [ServerReceiverPid | ServerPotentialSenderPid]} =
 1304:         ServerAcceptSocket,
 1305:     {ReceiverPid, PotentialSenderPid, HibernateAfter} =
 1306:         case CheckServer of
 1307:             true -> {ServerReceiverPid, ServerPotentialSenderPid,
 1308:                      ServerHibernateAfter};
 1309:             false -> {ClientReceiverPid, ClientPotentialSenderPid,
 1310:                       ClientHibernateAfter}
 1311:         end,
 1312:     SleepAmount = max(1.5*HibernateAfter, 500),
 1313:     ?CT_LOG("HibernateAfter = ~w SleepAmount = ~w", [HibernateAfter, SleepAmount]),
 1314:     ct:sleep(SleepAmount), %% Schedule out
 1315:     {current_function, {erlang, hibernate, 3}} =
 1316: 	process_info(ReceiverPid, current_function),
 1317:     IsTls = ssl_test_lib:is_tls_version(Version),
 1318:     case IsTls of
 1319:         true ->
 1320:             [SenderPid] = PotentialSenderPid,
 1321:             {current_function, {erlang, hibernate, 3}} =
 1322:                 process_info(SenderPid, current_function);
 1323:         _ -> %% DTLS (no sender process)
 1324:             ok
 1325:     end,
 1326:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1327:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
 1328:     ok.
 1329: 
 1330: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1331: listen_socket() ->
 1332:     [{doc,"Check error handling and inet compliance when calling API functions with listen sockets."}].
 1333: 
 1334: listen_socket(Config) ->
 1335:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1336:     {ok, ListenSocket} = ssl:listen(0, ServerOpts),
 1337:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, ServerOpts, tls),
 1338:     %% This can be a valid thing to do as
 1339:     %% options are inherited by the accept socket
 1340:     ok = ssl:controlling_process(ListenSocket, self()),
 1341: 
 1342:     {ok, _} = ssl:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1343: 
 1344:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:send(ListenSocket, <<"data">>),
 1345:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:recv(ListenSocket, 0),
 1346:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:connection_information(ListenSocket),
 1347:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:peername(ListenSocket),
 1348:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:peercert(ListenSocket),
 1349:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:renegotiate(ListenSocket),
 1350:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:export_key_materials(ListenSocket, [<<"Label">>], [<<"Context">>], 256),
 1351:     %% Legacy test
 1352:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:prf(ListenSocket, master_secret,
 1353:                                 <<"Label">>, [client_random, server_random], 256),
 1354:     case Protocol of
 1355:         tls ->
 1356:             {error, enotconn} = ssl:shutdown(ListenSocket, read_write);
 1357:         dtls ->
 1358:             {error, notsup} = ssl:shutdown(ListenSocket, read_write)
 1359:     end,
 1360:     ok = ssl:close(ListenSocket).
 1361: 
 1362: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1363: peername() ->
 1364:     [{doc,"Test API function peername/1"}].
 1365: 
 1366: peername(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1367:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1368:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1369:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1370: 
 1371:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 1372:                [
 1373:                 {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1374:                 {from, self()},
 1375:                 {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1376:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1377:     {Client, CSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client(
 1378:                           [return_socket,
 1379:                            {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1380:                            {host, Hostname},
 1381:                            {from, self()},
 1382:                            {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1383: 
 1384:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1385: 
 1386:     Server ! get_socket,
 1387:     SSocket =
 1388:         receive
 1389:             {Server, {socket, Socket}} ->
 1390:                 Socket
 1391:         end,
 1392: 
 1393:     {ok, ServerPeer} = ssl:peername(SSocket),
 1394:     ?CT_LOG("Server's peer: ~p~n", [ServerPeer]),
 1395:     {ok, ClientPeer} = ssl:peername(CSocket),
 1396:     ?CT_LOG("Client's peer: ~p~n", [ClientPeer]),
 1397: 
 1398:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1399:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1400: 
 1401: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1402:

 1479: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1480: recv_timeout() ->
 1481:     [{doc,"Test ssl:recv timeout"}].
 1482: 
 1483: recv_timeout(Config) ->
 1484:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1485:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1486: 
 1487:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1488: 
 1489:     Server =
 1490: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1491: 				   {from, self()},
 1492: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, send_recv_result_timeout_server, []}},
 1493: 				   {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1494:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1495: 
 1496:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1497: 					{host, Hostname},
 1498: 					{from, self()},
 1499: 					{mfa, {?MODULE,
 1500: 					       send_recv_result_timeout_client, []}},
 1501: 					{options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1502: 
 1503:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, ok, Server, ok),
 1504:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1505:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1506: 
 1507: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1508: recv_close() ->
 1509:     [{doc,"Special case of call error handling"}].
 1510: recv_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1511:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1512:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1513: 
 1514:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1515:     Server  = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1516: 					  {from, self()},
 1517: 					  {mfa, {?MODULE, do_recv_close, []}},
 1518: 					 {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1519:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1520:     {_Client, #sslsocket{} = SslSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 1521: 									   {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1522: 									   {host, Hostname},
 1523: 									   {from, self()},
 1524: 									   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1525: 									   {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1526:     ssl:close(SslSocket),
 1527:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok).
 1528: 
 1529: 
 1530: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1531: recv_no_active_msg() ->
 1532:     [{doc,"If we have a passive socket and do not call recv and peer closes we should no get"
 1533:       "receive an active message"}].
 1534: recv_no_active_msg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1535:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1536:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1537: 
 1538:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1539:     Server  = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1540: 					  {from, self()},
 1541: 					  {mfa, {?MODULE, no_recv_no_active, []}},
 1542: 					 {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1543:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1544:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1545:                                         {host, Hostname},
 1546:                                         {from, self()},
 1547:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1548:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1549:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
 1550:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok).
 1551: 
 1552: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1553: controlling_process() ->
 1554:     [{doc,"Test API function controlling_process/2"}].
 1555: 
 1556: controlling_process(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1557:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1558:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1559:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1560:     ClientMsg = "Server hello",
 1561:     ServerMsg = "Client hello",
 1562:    
 1563:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([
 1564:                                         {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1565:                                         {from, self()}, 
 1566:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1567:                                                controlling_process_result, [self(),
 1568:                                                                             ServerMsg]}},
 1569:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1570:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1571:     {Client, CSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 1572:                                                    {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1573:                                                    {host, Hostname},
 1574:                                         {from, self()}, 
 1575: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1576: 				  controlling_process_result, [self(),
 1577: 							       ClientMsg]}},
 1578: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1579:     
 1580:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1581:     
 1582:     ServerMsg = ssl_test_lib:active_recv(CSocket, length(ServerMsg)),
 1583:     %% We do not have the TLS server socket but all messages form the client
 1584:     %% socket are now read, so ramining are form the server socket
 1585:     ClientMsg = ssl_active_recv(length(ClientMsg)),
 1586: 
 1587:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1588:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1589: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1590: controller_dies() ->
 1591:     [{doc,"Test that the socket is closed after controlling process dies"}].
 1592: controller_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1593:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1594:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1595:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1596:     ClientMsg = "Hello server",
 1597:     ServerMsg = "Hello client",
 1598: 
 1599:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1600: 					{from, self()}, 
 1601: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1602: 					       controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1603: 									ServerMsg]}},
 1604: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
 1605:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1606:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1607: 					{host, Hostname},
 1608: 					{from, self()}, 
 1609: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1610: 					       controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1611: 									    ClientMsg]}},
 1612: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
 1613: 
 1614:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1615:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP), %% so that they are connected
 1616:     
 1617:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1618: 
 1619:     %% Test that clients die
 1620:     exit(Client, killed),
 1621:     get_close(Client, ?LINE),
 1622: 
 1623:     %% Test that clients die when process disappear
 1624:     Server ! listen, 
 1625:     Tester = self(),
 1626:     Connect = fun(Pid) ->
 1627: 		      {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
 1628: 		      %% Make sure server finishes and verification
 1629: 		      %% and is in coonection state before
 1630: 		      %% killing client
 1631: 		      ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 1632: 		      Pid ! {self(), connected, Socket},
 1633: 		      receive die_nice -> normal end
 1634: 	      end,
 1635:     Client2 = spawn_link(fun() -> Connect(Tester) end),
 1636:     receive {Client2, connected, _Socket} ->  Client2 ! die_nice end,
 1637:     
 1638:     get_close(Client2, ?LINE),
 1639:     
 1640:     %% Test that clients die when the controlling process have changed 
 1641:     Server ! listen, 
 1642: 
 1643:     Client3 = spawn_link(fun() -> Connect(Tester) end),
 1644:     Controller = spawn_link(fun() -> receive die_nice -> normal end end),
 1645:     receive 
 1646: 	{Client3, connected, Socket} ->  
 1647: 	    ok = ssl:controlling_process(Socket, Controller),
 1648: 	    Client3 ! die_nice 
 1649:     end,
 1650: 
 1651:     ?CT_LOG("Waiting on exit ~p~n",[Client3]),
 1652:     receive {'EXIT', Client3, normal} -> ok end,
 1653:     
 1654:     receive   %% Client3 is dead but that doesn't matter, socket should not be closed.
 1655: 	Unexpected ->
 1656: 	    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 1657: 	    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 1658:     after 1000 ->
 1659: 	    ok
 1660:     end,
 1661:     Controller ! die_nice,
 1662:     get_close(Controller, ?LINE),
 1663:     
 1664:     %% Test that servers die
 1665:     Server ! listen, 
 1666:     LastClient = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1667: 					    {host, Hostname},
 1668: 					    {from, self()}, 
 1669: 					    {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1670: 						   controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1671: 									    ClientMsg]}},
 1672: 					    {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1673:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP), %% so that they are connected
 1674:     
 1675:     exit(Server, killed),
 1676:     get_close(Server, ?LINE),
 1677:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
 1678:     ssl_test_lib:close(LastClient).
 1679: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1680: controlling_process_transport_accept_socket() ->
 1681:     [{doc,"Only ssl:handshake and ssl:controlling_process is allowed for transport_accept:sockets"}].
 1682: controlling_process_transport_accept_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1683:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1684:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1685:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1686: 
 1687:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_transport_control([{node, ServerNode}, 
 1688:                                                           {port, 0},
 1689:                                                           {from, self()},
 1690:                                                           {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1691:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1692:     
 1693:     _Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1694:                                               {host, Hostname},
 1695:                                               {from, self()},
 1696:                                               {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1697:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1698:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
 1699: 
 1700: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1701: close_with_timeout() ->
 1702:       [{doc,"Test normal (not downgrade) ssl:close/2"}].
 1703: close_with_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1704:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1705:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1706:     
 1707:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1708: 
 1709:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1710: 					{from, self()},
 1711: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, tls_close, []}},
 1712: 					{options,[{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1713:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1714:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1715: 					{host, Hostname},
 1716: 					{from, self()},
 1717: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, tls_close, []}},
 1718: 					{options, [{active, false} |ClientOpts]}]),
 1719: 
 1720:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 1721: 
 1722: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1723: close_in_error_state() ->
 1724:     [{doc,"Special case of closing socket in error state"}].
 1725: close_in_error_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1726:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1727:     ServerOpts = [{cacertfile, "foo.pem"} | proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts0)],
 1728:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
 1729: 
 1730:     _ = spawn(?MODULE, run_error_server_close, [[self() | ServerOpts]]),
 1731:     receive
 1732:         {_Pid, Port} ->
 1733:             spawn_link(?MODULE, run_client_error, [[Port, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]]])
 1734:     end,
 1735:     receive
 1736:         ok ->
 1737:             ok;
 1738:         Other ->
 1739:             ct:fail(Other)
 1740:     end.
 1741: 
 1742: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1743: call_in_error_state() ->
 1744:     [{doc,"Special case of call error handling"}].
 1745: call_in_error_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1746:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1747:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
 1748:     ServerOpts = [{cacertfile, "foo.pem"} | proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts0)],
 1749:     Pid = spawn(?MODULE, run_error_server, [[self() | ServerOpts]]),
 1750:     receive
 1751:         {Pid, Port} ->
 1752:             spawn_link(?MODULE, run_client_error, [[Port, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]]])
 1753:     end,
 1754:     receive
 1755:         {error, closed} ->
 1756:             ok;
 1757:         Other ->
 1758:             ct:fail(Other)
 1759:     end.
 1760: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1761: close_transport_accept() ->
 1762:     [{doc,"Tests closing ssl socket when waiting on ssl:transport_accept/1"}].
 1763: 
 1764: close_transport_accept(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1765:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1766:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, _Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1767: 
 1768:     Port = 0,
 1769:     Opts = [{active, false} | ServerOpts],
 1770:     {ok, ListenSocket} = rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, listen, [Port, Opts]),
 1771:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 1772: 			ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 1773: 			rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, close, [ListenSocket])
 1774: 	       end),
 1775:     case rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, transport_accept, [ListenSocket]) of
 1776: 	{error, closed} ->
 1777: 	    ok;
 1778: 	Other ->
 1779: 	    exit({?LINE, Other})
 1780:     end.
 1781: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1782: abuse_transport_accept_socket() ->
 1783:     [{doc,"Only ssl:handshake and ssl:controlling_process is allowed for transport_accept:sockets"}].
 1784: abuse_transport_accept_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1785:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1786:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1787:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1788: 
 1789:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_transport_abuse_socket([{node, ServerNode}, 
 1790:                                                                {port, 0},
 1791:                                                                {from, self()},
 1792:                                                                {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1793:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1794:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1795:                                         {host, Hostname},
 1796:                                         {from, self()},
 1797:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1798:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),

 1800:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1801:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).

 1804: 
 1805: invalid_keyfile() ->
 1806:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid key file"}].
 1807: invalid_keyfile(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1808:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1809:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1810:     BadKeyFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1811: 			      "badkey.pem"]),
 1812:     BadOpts = [{keyfile, BadKeyFile}| proplists:delete(keyfile, ServerOpts)],
 1813:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1814: 
 1815:     Server = 
 1816: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1817: 					 {from, self()},
 1818: 			    {options, BadOpts}]),
 1819: 
 1820:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1821: 
 1822:     Client =
 1823: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 1824: 			    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 1825: 			    {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1826: 
 1827:     File = proplists:get_value(keyfile,BadOpts),    
 1828:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server,
 1829:                               {error,{options, {keyfile, File, {error,enoent}}}}, Client,
 1830:                               {error, closed}).
 1831: 
 1832: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1833: honor_server_cipher_order_tls12() ->
 1834:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].
 1835: honor_server_cipher_order_tls12(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1836:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1837:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1838:                        mac => aead,
 1839:                        prf => sha256},
 1840:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1841:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1842:                        mac => aead,
 1843:                        prf => sha384}],
 1844:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1845:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1846:                        mac => aead,
 1847:                        prf => sha384},
 1848:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1849:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1850:                        mac => aead,
 1851:                        prf => sha256}],
 1852:     honor_cipher_order(Config, true, ServerCiphers,
 1853:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1854:                                         cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1855:                                         mac => aead,
 1856:                                         prf => sha384}).
 1857: 
 1858: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1859: 
 1860: honor_client_cipher_order_tls12() ->
 1861:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].
 1862: honor_client_cipher_order_tls12(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1863:      ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1864:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1865:                        mac => aead,
 1866:                        prf => sha256},
 1867:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1868:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1869:                        mac => aead,
 1870:                        prf => sha384}],
 1871:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1872:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1873:                        mac => aead,
 1874:                        prf => sha384},
 1875:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1876:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1877:                        mac => aead,
 1878:                        prf => sha256}],
 1879:     honor_cipher_order(Config, false, ServerCiphers,
 1880:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1881:                                         cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1882:                                         mac => aead,
 1883:                                         prf => sha256}).

 1886: honor_server_cipher_order() ->
 1887:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].
 1888: honor_server_cipher_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1889:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1890:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc,
 1891:                        mac => sha,
 1892:                        prf => default_prf},
 1893:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1894:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc,
 1895:                        mac => sha,
 1896:                        prf => default_prf}],
 1897:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1898:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc,
 1899:                        mac => sha,
 1900:                        prf => default_prf},
 1901:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1902:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc,
 1903:                        mac => sha,
 1904:                        prf => default_prf}],
 1905:     honor_cipher_order(Config, true, ServerCiphers,
 1906:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1907:                                         cipher => aes_256_cbc,
 1908:                                         mac => sha,
 1909:                                         prf => default_prf}).
 1910:

 1917:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc,
