 1939: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1940: ipv6() ->
 1941:     [{require, ipv6_hosts},
 1942:      {doc,"Test ipv6."}].
 1943: ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1944:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
 1945:     
 1946:     case lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts)) of
 1947: 	true ->
 1948: 	    ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1949: 	    ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1950: 	    {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = 
 1951: 		ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config, ipv6),
 1952: 	    Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, 
 1953: 				   {port, 0}, {from, self()}, 
 1954: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1955: 				   {options,  
 1956: 				    [inet6, {active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1957: 	    Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server), 
 1958: 	    Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, 
 1959: 				   {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 1960: 				   {from, self()}, 
 1961: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1962: 				   {options, 
 1963: 				    [inet6, {active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1964: 	    
 1965: 	    ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1966: 	    
 1967: 	    ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 1968: 	    
 1969: 	    ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1970: 	    ssl_test_lib:close(Client);
 1971: 	false ->
 1972: 	    {skip, "Host does not support IPv6"}
 1973:     end.
 1974: 
 1975: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1976: der_input() ->
 1977:     [{doc,"Test to input certs and key as der"}].
 1978: 
 1979: der_input(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1980:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1981:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam.pem"),
 1982: 
 1983:     {status, _, _, StatusInfo} = sys:get_status(whereis(ssl_manager)),
 1984:     [_, _,_, _, Prop] = StatusInfo,
 1985:     State = ssl_test_lib:state(Prop),
 1986:     [CADb | _] = element(5, State),
 1987:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP*2), %%Make sure there is no outstanding clean cert db msg in manager
 1988:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 1989:     ?CT_LOG("Size ~p", [Size]),
 1990: 
 1991:     SeverVerifyOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1992:     {ServerCert, ServerKey, ServerCaCerts, DHParams} = der_input_opts([{dhfile, DHParamFile} |
 1993: 								       SeverVerifyOpts]),
 1994:     ClientVerifyOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1995:     {ClientCert, ClientKey, ClientCaCerts, DHParams} = der_input_opts([{dhfile, DHParamFile} |
 1996: 								       ClientVerifyOpts]),
 1997:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 1998: 		  {dh, DHParams},
 1999: 		  {cert, ServerCert}, {key, ServerKey}, {cacerts, ServerCaCerts}],
 2000:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 2001: 		  {cert, ClientCert}, {key, ClientKey}, {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
 2002:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2003:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 2004: 					{from, self()},
 2005: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2006: 					{options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 2007:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2008:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 2009: 					{host, Hostname},
 2010: 					{from, self()},
 2011: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2012: 					{options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2013: 
 2014:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 2015:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 2016:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
 2017:     %% Using only DER input should not increase file indexed DB 
 2018:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 2019: 
 2020:     ServerOpts1 = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 2021:                    {dh, DHParams},
 2022:                    {cert, ServerCert}, {key, ServerKey},
 2023:                    {cacerts, [ #cert{der=Der, otp=public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Der, otp)}
 2024:                                || Der <- ServerCaCerts]}],
 2025:     ClientOpts1 = [{verify, verify_peer},
 2026:                    {cert, ClientCert}, {key, ClientKey},
 2027:                    {cacerts, [ #cert{der=Der, otp=public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Der, otp)}
 2028:                                || Der <- ClientCaCerts]}],
 2029:     Server1 = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 2030:                                          {from, self()},
 2031:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2032:                                          {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts1]}]),
 2033:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
 2034:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port1},
 2035:                                          {host, Hostname},
 2036:                                          {from, self()},
 2037:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2038:                                          {options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts1]}]),
 2039: 
 2040:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, ok, Client1, ok),
 2041:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server1),
 2042:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
 2043:     %% Using only DER input should not increase file indexed DB 
 2044:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 2045: 
 2046:     ok.
 2047: 
 2048: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2049: invalid_certfile() ->
 2050:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid cert file"}].
 2051: 
 2052: invalid_certfile(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2053:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2054:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2055:     BadCertFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 2056:                                  "badcert.pem"]),
 2057:     ServerBadOpts = [{certfile, BadCertFile}| proplists:delete(certfile, ServerOpts)],
 2058:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2059: 
 2060: 
 2061:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2062:     
 2063:     Server = 
 2064: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2065: 					 {from, self()},
 2066: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts}]),
 2067: 
 2068:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2069: 
 2070:     Client =
 2071: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2072: 					 {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 2073: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2074: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2075:     File = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerBadOpts),
 2076:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, {error,{options, {certfile, File, {error,enoent}}}}, 
 2077: 			      Client, {error, closed}).
 2078:     
 2079:

 2081: invalid_cacertfile() ->
 2082:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid cacert file"}].
 2083: 
 2084: invalid_cacertfile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2085:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2086:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2087:     BadCACertFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 2088:                                  "badcacert.pem"]),
 2089:     ServerBadOpts = [{cacertfile, BadCACertFile}| proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts)],
 2090:     
 2091:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2092: 
 2093:     Server0  = 
 2094: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, 
 2095: 					 {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 2096: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts}]),
 2097: 
 2098:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
 2099:     
 2100: 
 2101:     Client0 =
 2102: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2103: 					 {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 2104: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2105: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2106: 
 2107:     File0 = proplists:get_value(cacertfile, ServerBadOpts),
 2108:     
 2109:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, {error, {options, {cacertfile, File0,{error,enoent}}}},
 2110: 			      Client0, {error, closed}),
 2111:     
 2112:     File = File0 ++ "do_not_exit.pem",
 2113:     ServerBadOpts1 = [{cacertfile, File}|proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerBadOpts)],
 2114:             
 2115:     Server1  = 
 2116: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, 
 2117: 					 {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 2118: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts1}]),
 2119: 
 2120:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
 2121:     
 2122:     Client1 =
 2123: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2124: 					 {port, Port1}, {host, Hostname},
 2125: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2126: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2127: 
 2128: 
 2129:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, {error, {options, {cacertfile, File,{error,enoent}}}},
 2130: 			      Client1, {error, closed}),
 2131:     ok.
 2132: 
 2133: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2134: new_options_in_handshake() ->
 2135:     [{doc,"Test that you can set ssl options in handshake/3 and not only in tcp upgrade"}].
 2136: new_options_in_handshake(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2137:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2138:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2139:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 2140:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2141: 
 2142:     Ciphers = [_, Cipher | _] = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, Version), 
 2143:                                                          [{key_exchange,
 2144:                                                  fun(dhe_rsa) ->
 2145:                                                          true;
 2146:                                                     (ecdhe_rsa) ->
 2147:                                                          true;
 2148:                                                     (rsa) ->
 2149:                                                          false;
 2150:                                                     (_) ->
 2151:                                                          false
 2152:                                                  end
 2153:                                                 }]),
 2154:     
 2155:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2156: 					{from, self()}, 
 2157: 					{ssl_extra_opts, [{versions, [Version]},
 2158: 							  {ciphers,[Cipher]}]}, %% To be set in handshake/3
 2159: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 2160: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
 2161:     
 2162:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2163:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 2164: 					{host, Hostname},
 2165: 					{from, self()}, 
 2166: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 2167: 					{options, [{ciphers, Ciphers} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2168:     
 2169:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 2170: 
 2171:     ServerMsg = ClientMsg = {ok, {Version, Cipher}},
 2172:    
 2173:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
 2174:     
 2175:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 2176:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 2177: 
 2178: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2179: max_handshake_size() ->
 2180:     [{doc,"Test that we can set max_handshake_size to max value."}].
 2181: 
 2182: max_handshake_size(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2183:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2184:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),  
 2185: 
 2186:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2187:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2188: 					{from, self()}, 
 2189: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 2190: 					{options,  [{max_handshake_size, 8388607} |ServerOpts]}]),
 2191:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2192:     
 2193:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 2194: 					{host, Hostname},
 2195: 					{from, self()}, 
 2196: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 2197: 					{options, [{max_handshake_size, 8388607} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2198:  
 2199:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 2200:   
 2201: 
 2202: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2203: 
 2204: -define(FUNC_CLAUSE(EXPR), try EXPR, error(should_fail) catch _:function_clause -> ok end).
 2205: 
 2206: options_not_proplist() ->
 2207:     [{doc,"Test what happens if an option is not a key value tuple"}].
 2208: 
 2209: options_not_proplist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2210:     BadOption =  {client_preferred_next_protocols, 
 2211: 		  client, [<<"spdy/3">>,<<"http/1.1">>], <<"http/1.1">>},
 2212:     {error, {options, {option_not_a_key_value_tuple, BadOption}}} =
 2213: 	ssl:connect("twitter.com", 443, [binary, {active, false}, 
 2214: 					 BadOption]),
 2215:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", 443)),
 2216:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", 443, infinity)),
 2217:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", [], infinity_misspelled)),
 2218:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", foo, [], infinity)),
 2219:     %% While at it test some other functions as well for regression testing
 2220:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:listen([], 443)),
 2221:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:transport_accept(#sslsocket{}, [])),
 2222:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(#sslsocket{}, [])),
 2223:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(foo, #sslsocket{})),
 2224:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(foo, #sslsocket{}, 1000)),
 2225:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(#sslsocket{}, 1000, 1000)),
 2226:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(#sslsocket{}, [opt_list], [])),
 2227:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake_continue(socket, [opt_list], [])),
 2228:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake_continue(socket, 1000, 1000)),
 2229: 
 2230:     ok.
 2231: 
 2232: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2233: invalid_options() ->
 2234:     [{doc,"Test what happens when we give invalid options"}].
 2235:        
 2236: invalid_options(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2237:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2238:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2239:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2240:     
 2241:     Check = fun(Client, Server, {versions, [sslv2, sslv3]} = Option) ->
 2242: 		    ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, 
 2243: 					      {error, {options, {sslv2, Option}}}, 
 2244: 					      Client,
 2245: 					      {error, {options, {sslv2, Option}}});
 2246: 	       (Client, Server, Option) ->
 2247: 		    ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, 
 2248: 					      {error, {options, Option}}, 
 2249: 					      Client,
 2250: 					      {error, {options, Option}})
 2251: 	    end,
 2252: 
 2253:     TestOpts = 
 2254:          [{versions, [sslv2, sslv3]}, 
 2255:           {verify_fun, function},
 2256:           {fail_if_no_peer_cert, 0}, 
 2257:           {depth, four}, 
 2258:           {certfile, 'cert.pem'}, 
 2259:           {keyfile,'key.pem' }, 
 2260:           {password, foo},
 2261:           {cacertfile, ""}, 
 2262:           {ciphers, [{foo, bar, sha, ignore}]},
 2263:           {reuse_session, foo},
 2264:           {reuse_sessions, 0},
 2265:           {renegotiate_at, "10"},
 2266:           {mode, depech},
 2267:           {packet, 8.0},
 2268:           {packet_size, "2"},
 2269:           {header, a},
 2270:           {active, trice},
 2271:           {key, 'key.pem' }],
 2272: 
 2273:     TestOpts2 =
 2274:         [{[{supported_groups, []}, {versions, [tlsv1]}],
 2275:           {options,incompatible,[supported_groups,{versions,['tlsv1']}]}}],
 2276: 
 2277:     [begin
 2278: 	 Server =
 2279: 	     ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 2280: 					{from, self()},
 2281: 					{options, ServerOpts ++ [TestOpt]}]),
 2282: 	 %% Will never reach a point where port is used.
 2283: 	 Client =
 2284: 	     ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
 2285: 					      {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 2286: 					      {options, ClientOpts ++ [TestOpt]}]),
 2287: 	 Check(Client, Server, TestOpt),
 2288: 	 ok
 2289:      end || TestOpt <- TestOpts],
 2290: 
 2291:     [begin
 2292:          start_client_negative(Config, TestOpt, ErrorMsg),
 2293:          ok
 2294:      end || {TestOpt, ErrorMsg} <- TestOpts2],
 2295:     ok.
 2296: 
 2297: options_whitebox() ->
 2298:     [{doc,"Whitebox tests of option handling"}].
 2299: 
 2300: 
 2301: customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host) ->
 2302:     %% In many options test scenarios we do not care about verifcation options
 2303:     %% but the client now requiers verification options by default.
 2304:     DefOpts = case Role of
 2305:                   client ->
 2306:                       case proplists:get_value(verify, Opts, undefined) of
 2307:                           undefined -> [{verify, verify_none}];
 2308:                           _ -> []
 2309:                       end;
 2310:                   server ->
 2311:                       Ciphers = proplists:get_value(ciphers, Opts, undefined),
 2312:                       Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, Opts, undefined),
 2313:                       Key = proplists:get_value(key, Opts, undefined),
 2314:                       CertsKeys = proplists:get_value(certs_keys, Opts, undefined),
 2315:                       NoCertOrKeys = Cert == undefined orelse Key == undefined andalso
 2316:                           CertsKeys == undefined,
 2317:                       if Ciphers == undefined andalso NoCertOrKeys ->
 2318:                               [{certs_keys, [#{cert => <<>>, key => {rsa, <<>>}}]}];
 2319:                          true ->
 2320:                               []
 2321:                       end
 2322:               end,
 2323:     NoVerify = case Role of
 2324:                    client -> [{verify, verify_none}|DefOpts];
 2325:                    server -> DefOpts
 2326:                end,
 2327:     case proplists:get_value(protocol, Opts, tls) of
 2328:         dtls ->
 2329:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options([{protocol, dtls}|NoVerify], Role, Host),
 2330:             {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts};
 2331:         tls ->
 2332:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options(NoVerify, Role, Host),
 2333:             case proplists:get_value(versions, Opts) of
 2334:                 undefined ->
 2335:                     {DOpts, DefOpts ++ [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|Opts]};
 2336:                 _ ->
 2337:                     {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts}
 2338:             end;
 2339:         _ ->
 2340:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options(NoVerify, Role, Host),
 2341:             {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts}
 2342:     end.
 2343: 
 2344: -define(OK(EXP, Opts, Role), ?OK(EXP,Opts, Role, [])).
 2345: -define(OK(EXP, Opts, Role, ShouldBeMissing),
 2346:         fun() ->
 2347:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2348:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2349:                 try ssl:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2350:                     {ok, #config{ssl=EXP = __ALL}} ->
 2351:                         ShouldBeMissing = ShouldBeMissing -- maps:keys(__ALL);
 2352:                     Other ->
 2353:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2354:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2355:                 catch
 2356:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2357:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2358:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2359:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2360:                 end,
 2361:                 try ssl:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2362:                     EXP = __ALL2 ->
 2363:                         ShouldBeMissing = ShouldBeMissing -- maps:keys(__ALL2);
 2364:                     Other2 ->
 2365:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2366:                                "ssl:update_options(~w,~w, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2367:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2368:                         error({unexpected2, Other2})
 2369:                 catch
 2370:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2371:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2372:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2373:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2374:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2375:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2, ST2})
 2376:                 end
 2377:         end()).
 2378: 
 2379: -define(ERR(EXP, Opts, Role),
 2380:         fun() ->
 2381:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2382:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2383:                 try ssl:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2384:                     Other ->
 2385:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2386:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2387:                 catch
 2388:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2389:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2390:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2391:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2392:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2393:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2394:                 end,
 2395:                 try ssl:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2396:                     Other2 ->
 2397:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2398:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2399:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2400:                         error({unexpected, Other2})
 2401:                 catch
 2402:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2403:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2404:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2405:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2406:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2407:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2408:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2409:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2,ST2})
 2410:                 end
 2411:         end()).
 2412: 
 2413: -define(ERR_UPD(EXP, Opts, Role),
 2414:         fun() ->
 2415:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2416:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2417:                 try ssl:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2418:                     {ok, #config{}} ->
 2419:                         ok;
 2420:                     Other ->
 2421:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2422:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2423:                 catch
 2424:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2425:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2426:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2427:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2428:                 end,
 2429:                 try ssl:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2430:                     Other2 ->
 2431:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2432:                                 "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2433:                                 [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2434:                         error({unexpected, Other2})
 2435:                 catch
 2436:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2437:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2438:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2439:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2440:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2441:                                 "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2442:                                 [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2443:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2,ST2})
 2444:                 end
 2445:         end()).
 2446: 
 2447: 
 2448: options_whitebox(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2449:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2450:     true = is_binary(Cert),
 2451:     ?OK(#{verify := verify_peer},  %% Check Option order last wins
 2452:         [{verify, verify_none}, {verify,verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], client),
 2453:     options_protocol(Config),
 2454:     options_version(Config),
 2455:     options_alpn(Config),
 2456:     options_anti_replay(Config),
 2457:     options_beast_mitigation(Config),
 2458:     options_cacerts(Config),
 2459:     options_cert(Config),
 2460:     options_certificate_authorities(Config),
 2461:     options_ciphers(Config),
 2462:     options_client_renegotiation(Config),
 2463:     options_cookie(Config),
 2464:     options_crl(Config),
 2465:     options_hostname_check(Config),
 2466:     options_dh(Config),
 2467:     options_early_data(Config),
 2468:     options_eccs(Config),
 2469:     options_verify(Config),
 2470:     options_fallback(Config),
 2471:     options_handshake(Config),
 2472:     options_process(Config),
 2473:     options_honor(Config),
 2474:     options_debug(Config),
 2475:     options_renegotiate(Config),
 2476:     options_middlebox(Config),
 2477:     options_frag_len(Config),
 2478:     options_stapling(Config),
 2479:     options_padding(Config),
 2480:     options_identity(Config),
 2481:     options_reuse_session(Config),
 2482:     options_sni(Config),
 2483:     options_sign_alg(Config),
 2484:     options_supported_groups(Config),
 2485:     options_use_srtp(Config),
 2486:     ok.
 2487: 
 2488: options_protocol(_Config) ->
 2489:     ?OK(#{protocol := tls},  [], client),
 2490:     ?OK(#{protocol := tls},  [{protocol, tls}], client),
 2491:     ?OK(#{protocol := dtls}, [{protocol, dtls}], client),
 2492: 
 2493:     %% Errors
 2494:     ?ERR({protocol, foo}, [{protocol, 'foo'}], client),
 2495: 
 2496:     begin %% erl_dist
 2497:         ?OK(#{}, [], client, [erl_dist]),
 2498:         ?OK(#{}, [{erl_dist, false}], client, [erl_dist]),
 2499:         ?OK(#{erl_dist := true}, [{erl_dist, true}], client),
 2500:         ?OK(#{}, [], client, [ktls]),
 2501:         ?OK(#{}, [{ktls, false}], client, [ktls]),
 2502:         ?OK(#{ktls := true}, [{ktls, true}], client)
 2503:     end,
 2504:     ok.
 2505: 
 2506: options_version(_Config) ->
 2507:     ?OK(#{versions := [_|_]}, [], client),  %% Hmm some machines still default only ?TLS_1_2
 2508:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2]}, [{protocol, dtls}], client),
 2509: 
 2510:     ?OK(#{versions := [?TLS_1_3,?TLS_1_2,?TLS_1_1,?TLS_1_0]},
 2511:         [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1','tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
 2512:         client),
 2513:     ?OK(#{versions := [?TLS_1_3]}, [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client),
 2514: 
 2515:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2,?DTLS_1_0]},
 2516:         [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1', 'dtlsv1.2']}],  client),
 2517:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2]}, [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1.2']}], client),
 2518: 
 2519: 
 2520:     %% Errors
 2521:     ?ERR({versions, []}, [{versions, []}], client),
 2522:     ?ERR({versions, []}, [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, []}], client),
 2523: 
 2524:     ?ERR({'tlsv1.4',{versions, ['tlsv1.4']}},
 2525:          [{versions, ['tlsv1.4']}], client),
 2526:     ?ERR({'dtlsv1', {versions, _}},
 2527:          [{versions, ['dtlsv1', 'dtlsv1.2']}], client),
 2528: 
 2529:     ?ERR({'tlsv1', {versions, _}},
 2530:          [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1','tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
 2531:          client),
 2532:     ?ERR({'dtlsv1.3',{versions, ['dtlsv1.3']}},
 2533:          [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1.3']}],
 2534:          client),
 2535:     ?ERR({options,missing_version,{'tlsv1.2',_}},
 2536:          [{versions, ['tlsv1.1','tlsv1.3']}],
 2537:          client),
 2538:     ok.
 2539: 
 2540: options_alpn(_Config) -> %% alpn & next_protocols
 2541:     Http = <<"HTTP/2">>,
 2542:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := undefined}, [], client,
 2543:         [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2544:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := undefined},  [], server,
 2545:         [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2546: 
 2547:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := [Http]}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http]}],
 2548:         server, [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2549:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := [Http]}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [Http]}],
 2550:         client, [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2551: 
 2552:     %% Note names have been swapped in client/server variants
 2553: 
 2554:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := undefined, next_protocols_advertised := [Http]},
 2555:         [{next_protocols_advertised, [Http]}], server, [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector]),
 2556:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := undefined, next_protocol_selector := _},
 2557:         [{client_preferred_next_protocols, {server,[Http], Http}}],
 2558:         client, [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2559: 
 2560:     %% Errors
 2561:     ?ERR({alpn_preferred_protocols, {invalid_protocol, <<>>}}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http, <<>>]}], server),
 2562:     ?ERR({alpn_advertised_protocols, Http}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, Http}], client),
 2563:     ?ERR({alpn_preferred_protocols, undefined}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, undefined}], server),
 2564:     ?ERR({alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}], client),
 2565:     ?ERR({option, server_only, alpn_preferred_protocols}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http]}], client),
 2566:     ?ERR({option, client_only, alpn_advertised_protocols}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [Http]}], server),
 2567:     ?ERR({option, server_only, next_protocols_advertised}, [{next_protocols_advertised, [Http]}], client),
 2568:     ?ERR({option, client_only, client_preferred_next_protocols}, [{client_preferred_next_protocols, [Http]}], server),
 2569:     ok.
 2570: 
 2571: options_anti_replay(_Config) ->
 2572:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := undefined}, [], server),
 2573:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2574:         [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2575:         server),
 2576:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2577:         [{anti_replay, {42,4711,21}}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2578:         server),
 2579:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2580:         [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2581:         server),
 2582:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2583:         [{anti_replay, {42,4711,21}}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2584:         server),
 2585: 
 2586: 
 2587:     %% Errors
 2588:     ?ERR({option, server_only, anti_replay},
 2589:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, manual}],
 2590:          client),
 2591:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{anti_replay, _}, {session_tickets, disabled}]},
 2592:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}],
 2593:          server),
 2594:     ?ERR({options,incompatible, [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1']}]},
 2595:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}, {versions, ['tlsv1']}],
 2596:          server),
 2597:     ?ERR({anti_replay, '1k'},
 2598:          [{anti_replay, '1k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2599:          server),
 2600:     ?ERR({anti_replay, _},
 2601:          [{anti_replay, {1,1,1,1}}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2602:          server),
 2603:     ?ERR({options,incompatible, [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1']}]},
 2604:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}, {versions, ['tlsv1']}],
 2605:          server),
 2606:     ?ERR({anti_replay, '1k'},
 2607:          [{anti_replay, '1k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2608:          server),
 2609:     ?ERR({anti_replay, _},
 2610:          [{anti_replay, {1,1,1,1}}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2611:          server),
 2612:     ok.
 2613: 
 2614: options_beast_mitigation(_Config) -> %% Beast mitigation TLS-1.0 option only
 2615:     ?OK(#{beast_mitigation := one_n_minus_one}, [{versions, [tlsv1,'tlsv1.1']}], client),
 2616:     ?OK(#{}, [{versions, ['tlsv1.1']}], client, [beast_mitigation]),
 2617:     ?OK(#{}, [{beast_mitigation, disabled}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client,
 2618:         [beast_mitigation]),
 2619:     ?OK(#{beast_mitigation := zero_n},
 2620:         [{beast_mitigation, zero_n}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),
 2621: 
 2622:     %% Errors
 2623:     ?ERR({beast_mitigation, enabled},
 2624:          [{beast_mitigation, enabled}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),
 2625:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [beast_mitigation, {versions, _}]},
 2626:          [{beast_mitigation, disabled}], client),
 2627:     ok.
 2628: 
 2629: options_cacerts(Config) ->  %% cacert[s]file
 2630:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2631:     File = case os:type() of
 2632:                {win32, _} -> <<"c:/tmp/foo">>;
 2633:                _ -> <<"/tmp/foo">>
 2634:            end,
 2635:     ?OK(#{cacerts := undefined}, [], client, [cacertfile]),
 2636:     ?OK(#{cacerts := undefined, cacertfile := File},
 2637:         [{cacertfile, File}], client),
 2638:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [Cert]}, [{cacerts, [Cert]}, {verify, verify_peer}],
 2639:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2640:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [#cert{}]}, [{cacerts, [#cert{der=Cert, otp=dummy}]}],
 2641:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2642:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [Cert]}, [{cacerts, [Cert]}, {cacertfile, "/tmp/foo"}],
 2643:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2644: 
 2645:     %% Errors
 2646:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _}, [{verify, verify_peer}], server),
 2647:     ?ERR({cacerts, Cert}, [{cacerts, Cert}], client),
 2648:     ?ERR({cacertfile, cert}, [{cacertfile, cert}], client),
 2649: 
 2650:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [depth]),
 2651:     ?OK(#{depth := 5}, [{depth, 5}], client),
 2652:     %% Error
 2653:     ?ERR({depth, 256}, [{depth, 256}], client),
 2654:     ?ERR({depth, not_an_int}, [{depth, not_an_int}], client),
 2655:     ok.
 2656: 
 2657: options_cert(Config) -> %% cert[file] cert_keys keys password
 2658:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2659:     Old = [cert, certfile, key, keyfile, password],
 2660:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := []}, [], client, Old),
 2661:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{cert := [Cert]}]}, [{cert,Cert}], client, Old),
 2662:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{cert := [Cert]}]}, [{cert,[Cert]}], client, Old),
 2663:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{certfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>, keyfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>}]},
 2664:         [{certfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], client, Old),
 2665: 
 2666:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{}]}, [{certs_keys, [#{}]}], client),
 2667: 
 2668:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := {rsa, <<>>}}]},
 2669:         [{key, {rsa, <<>>}}], client, Old),
 2670:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2671:         [{key, #{engine => foo, algorithm => foo, key_id => foo}}], client, Old),
 2672:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2673:         [{key, #{algorithm => eddsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}},
 2674:          {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client, Old),
 2675:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2676:         [{key, #{algorithm => ecdsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}}],
 2677:         client, Old),
 2678:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2679:         [{key, #{algorithm => rsa,
 2680:                   sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end,
 2681:                  encrypt_fun => fun(_,_,_) -> << "dummy encrypt">> end}},
 2682:          {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1']}], client, Old),
 2683:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := _}]}, [{password, "foobar"}], client, Old),
 2684:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := _}]}, [{password, <<"foobar">>}], client, Old),
 2685:     Pwd = fun() -> "foobar" end,
 2686:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := Pwd}]}, [{password, Pwd}], client, Old),
 2687: 
 2688:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{certfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>, keyfile := <<"/tmp/baz">>}]},
 2689:         [{certfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}, {keyfile, "/tmp/baz"}], client, Old),
 2690: 
 2691:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{}]},
 2692:         [{cert, Cert}, {certfile, "/tmp/foo"}, {certs_keys, [#{}]}],
 2693:         client, Old),
 2694: 
 2695:     %% Errors
 2696:     ?ERR({options,incompatible,[key,{versions,['tlsv1.2']}]},
 2697:          [{key, #{algorithm => eddsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}},
 2698:           {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], client),
 2699:     ?ERR({options,incompatible,[key,{versions,['tlsv1.3','tlsv1.2']}]},
 2700:          [{key, #{algorithm => rsa,
 2701:                   sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end,
 2702:                   encrypt_fun => fun(_,_,_) -> << "dummy encrypt">> end
 2703:                  }}], client),
 2704:     ?ERR({cert, #{}}, [{cert, #{}}], client),
 2705:     ?ERR({certfile, cert}, [{certfile, cert}], client),
 2706:     ?ERR({certs_keys, #{}}, [{certs_keys, #{}}], client),
 2707:     ?ERR_UPD({certs_keys, cert_and_key_required}, [{certs_keys, []}], server),
 2708:     ?ERR({keyfile, #{}}, [{keyfile, #{}}], client),
 2709:     ?ERR({key, <<>>}, [{key, <<>>}], client),
 2710:     ?ERR({password, _}, [{password, fun(Arg) -> Arg end}], client),
 2711:     ok.
 2712: 
 2713: options_certificate_authorities(_Config) ->
 2714:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [certificate_authorities]),
 2715:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [certificate_authorities]),
 2716:     ?OK(#{certificate_authorities := true}, [{certificate_authorities, true}], client),
 2717:     ?OK(#{}, [{certificate_authorities, false}], client, [certificate_authorities]),
 2718:     ?OK(#{certificate_authorities := false}, [{certificate_authorities, false}], server),
 2719:     ?OK(#{}, [{certificate_authorities, true}], server, [certificate_authorities]),
 2720: 
 2721:     %% Errors
 2722:     ?ERR({certificate_authorities, []},
 2723:          [{certificate_authorities,  []}], client),
 2724:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [certificate_authorities, {versions, _}]},
 2725:          [{certificate_authorities, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}],
 2726:          client),
 2727:     ok.
 2728: 
 2729: options_ciphers(_Config) ->
 2730:     CipherSuite = ssl_test_lib:ecdh_dh_anonymous_suites(?TLS_1_2),
 2731:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [], client),
 2732:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, CipherSuite}], client),
 2733:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, "RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5"}], client),
 2734:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, ["RC4-SHA", "RC4-MD5"]}], client),
 2735: 
 2736:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, ["TLS_DH_anon_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA256"]}], server),
 2737:     %% Errors
 2738:     ?ERR({ciphers, _}, [{ciphers, "foobar:RC4-MD5"}], client),
 2739:     ?ERR({ciphers, _}, [{ciphers, ["RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5", "RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5"]}], client),
 2740:     ?ERR_UPD({certs_keys, cert_and_key_required}, [{ciphers, "RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5"}], server),
 2741:     ok.
 2742: 
 2743: options_client_renegotiation(_Config) ->
 2744:     ?OK(#{client_renegotiation := true}, [], server),
 2745:     ?OK(#{client_renegotiation := false}, [{client_renegotiation, false}], server),
 2746: 
 2747:     %% Errors
 2748:     ?ERR({client_renegotiation, []}, [{client_renegotiation,  []}], server),
 2749:     ?ERR({option, server_only, client_renegotiation}, [{client_renegotiation, true}], client),
 2750:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [client_renegotiation, {versions, _}]},
 2751:          [{client_renegotiation, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 2752:          server),
 2753:     ok.
 2754: 
 2755: 
 2756: options_cookie(_Config) ->
 2757:     ?OK(#{cookie := true},  [], server),
 2758:     ?OK(#{cookie := false}, [{cookie, false}], server),
 2759: 
 2760:     %% Errors
 2761:     ?ERR({cookie, []}, [{cookie,  []}], server),
 2762:     ?ERR({option, server_only, cookie}, [{cookie, true}], client),
 2763:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [cookie, {versions, _}]},
 2764:          [{cookie, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2765:     ok.
 2766: 
 2767: options_crl(_Config) ->
 2768:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_cache, _}, crl_check := false}, [], server),
 2769:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_cache, _}, crl_check := true},  [{crl_check, true}], server),
 2770:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_hash_dir, {_,_}}, crl_check := true},
 2771:         [{crl_check, true}, {crl_cache, {ssl_crl_hash_dir, {internal, [{dir, "/tmp"}]}}}],
 2772:         server),
 2773:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_cache, {_,_}}, crl_check := true},
 2774:         [{crl_check, true}, {crl_cache, {ssl_crl_cache, {internal, [{http, 5000}]}}}],
 2775:         server),
 2776:     %% Errors
 2777:     ?ERR({crl_check, foo}, [{crl_check, foo}], server),
 2778:     ?ERR({crl_cache, {a,b,c}}, [{crl_cache, {a,b,c}}], server),
 2779:     ok.
 2780: 
 2781: options_hostname_check(_Config) ->
 2782:     ?OK(#{customize_hostname_check := []}, [], client),
 2783:     ?OK(#{customize_hostname_check := [{match_fun, _}]},
 2784:         [{customize_hostname_check, [{match_fun, fun() -> ok end}]}],
 2785:         client),
 2786:     %% Error
 2787:     ?ERR({customize_hostname_check, _}, [{customize_hostname_check, {match_fun, pb_fun}}], client),
 2788:     ok.
 2789: 
 2790: options_dh(_Config) -> %% dh dhfile
 2791:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [dh, dhfile]),
 2792:     ?OK(#{dh := <<>>}, [{dh, <<>>}], server, [dhfile]),
 2793:     ?OK(#{dhfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>}, [{dhfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], server, [dh]),
 2794:     ?OK(#{dh := <<>>}, [{dh, <<>>}, {dhfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], server, [dhfile]),
 2795: 
 2796:     %% Should be an error
 2797:     ?OK(#{dhfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>},  %% Not available in 1.3
 2798:         [{dhfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], server, [dh]),
 2799: 
 2800:     %% Error
 2801:     ?ERR({dh, not_a_bin}, [{dh, not_a_bin}], server),
 2802:     ?ERR({dhfile, not_a_filename}, [{dhfile, not_a_filename}], server),
 2803:     ?ERR({option, server_only, dhfile}, [{dhfile, "file"}], client),
 2804:     ?ERR({option, server_only, dh}, [{dh, <<"DER">>}], client),
 2805:     ok.
 2806: 
 2807: options_early_data(_Config) -> %% early_data, session_tickets and use_ticket
 2808:     ?OK(#{early_data := undefined, session_tickets := disabled},
 2809:         [], client),
 2810:     ?OK(#{early_data := disabled, session_tickets := disabled, stateless_tickets_seed := undefined},
 2811:         [], server),
 2812: 
 2813:     ?OK(#{early_data := <<>>, session_tickets := auto},
 2814:         [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, auto}], client),
 2815:     ?OK(#{early_data := <<>>, session_tickets := manual, use_ticket := [<<1>>]},
 2816:         [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, manual}, {use_ticket, [<<1>>]}],
 2817:         client),
 2818: 
 2819:     ?OK(#{early_data := enabled, stateless_tickets_seed := <<"foo">>},
 2820:         [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, stateless}, {stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], server),
 2821:     ?OK(#{early_data := enabled, stateless_tickets_seed := <<"foo">>},
 2822:         [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}, {stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], server),
 2823: 
 2824:     ?OK(#{early_data := disabled}, [{early_data, disabled}], server),
 2825: 
 2826:     %% Errors
 2827:     ?ERR({option, client_only, use_ticket}, [{use_ticket, []}], server),
 2828:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _}, [{use_ticket, [<<>>]}], client),
 2829: 
 2830:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, foo}}, [{session_tickets, foo}], server),
 2831:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, manual}}, [{session_tickets, manual}], server),
 2832:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, stateful}}, [{session_tickets, stateful}], client),
 2833:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [session_tickets, {versions, _}]},
 2834:          [{session_tickets, stateful}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2835:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [session_tickets, {versions, _}]},
 2836:          [{session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2837: 
 2838:     ?ERR({use_ticket, foo},
 2839:          [{use_ticket, foo}, {session_tickets, manual}], client),
 2840: 
 2841:     ?ERR({early_data,undefined}, [{early_data, undefined}], client),
 2842:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, {session_tickets, _}]},
 2843:          [{early_data, <<>>}], client),
 2844:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, enabled}},
 2845:          [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, auto}], client),
 2846:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, _, {use_ticket, _}]},
 2847:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, manual}], client),
 2848: 
 2849:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, {session_tickets, _}]},
 2850:          [{early_data, enabled}], server),
 2851:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, <<>>}},
 2852:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, stateless}], server),
 2853:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, <<>>}},
 2854:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}], server),
 2855: 
 2856:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, stateful}]},
 2857:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}, {session_tickets, stateful}],
 2858:          server),
 2859:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}]},
 2860:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}, {session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}],
 2861:          server),
 2862:     ?ERR({stateless_tickets_seed, foo},
 2863:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, foo}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2864:          server),
 2865:     ?ERR({stateless_tickets_seed, foo},
 2866:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, foo}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2867:          server),
 2868:     ?ERR({option, server_only, stateless_tickets_seed},
 2869:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], client),
 2870:     ok.
 2871: 
 2872: options_eccs(_Config) ->
 2873:     Curves = tl(ssl:eccs()),
 2874:     ?OK(#{eccs := {elliptic_curves, [_|_]}}, [], client),
 2875:     ?OK(#{eccs := {elliptic_curves, [_|_]}}, [{eccs, Curves}], client),
 2876: 
 2877:     %% Errors
 2878:     ?ERR({eccs, not_a_list}, [{eccs, not_a_list}], client),
 2879:     ?ERR({eccs, none_valid}, [{eccs, []}], client),
 2880:     ?ERR({options,{eccs,[foo]}}, [{eccs, [foo]}], client),
 2881:     ok.
 2882: 
 2883: options_verify(Config) ->  %% fail_if_no_peer_cert, verify, verify_fun, partial_chain
 2884:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2885:     {ok, #config{ssl = DefOpts = #{verify_fun := {DefVerify,_}}}} = ssl:handle_options([{verify, verify_none}], client, "dummy.host.org"),
 2886: 
 2887:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := false, verify := verify_none, verify_fun := {DefVerify, []}, partial_chain := _},
 2888:         [], server),
 2889:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := undefined, partial_chain := _},
 2890:         [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2891:         server),
 2892:      ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := undefined, partial_chain := _},
 2893:          [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], server),
 2894: 
 2895:     NewF3 = fun(_,_,_) -> ok end,
 2896:     NewF4 = fun(_,_,_,_) -> ok end,
 2897:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [fail_if_no_peer_cert]),
 2898:     ?OK(#{verify := verify_none, verify_fun := {NewF3, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2899:         [{verify_fun, {NewF3, foo}}], client),
 2900:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := {NewF3, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2901:         [{verify_fun, {NewF3, foo}}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2902:         server),
 2903:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := {NewF4, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2904:         [{verify_fun, {NewF4, foo}}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2905:         server),
 2906: 
 2907: 
 2908:     %% check verify_fun in update_options case
 2909:     #{verify_fun := undefined} = ssl:update_options([{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], client, DefOpts),
 2910:     #{verify_fun := {NewF3, bar}} = ssl:update_options([{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]},
 2911:                                                         {verify_fun, {NewF3, bar}}],
 2912:                                                        client, DefOpts),
 2913: 
 2914:     %% Errors
 2915:     ?ERR({partial_chain, undefined}, [{partial_chain, undefined}], client),
 2916:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, verify_none}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}]},
 2917:          [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}], server),
 2918:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, _}, {cacerts, undefined}]}, [{verify, verify_peer}], client),
 2919:     ?ERR({option, server_only, fail_if_no_peer_cert},
 2920:          [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2921:          client),
 2922:     ?ERR({verify, verify}, [{verify, verify}], client),
 2923:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, _}, {cacerts, undefined}]}, [{verify, verify_peer}], server),
 2924:     ?ERR({partial_chain, not_a_fun}, [{partial_chain, not_a_fun}], client),
 2925:     ?ERR({verify_fun, not_a_fun}, [{verify_fun, not_a_fun}], client),
 2926:     ok.
 2927: 
 2928: options_fallback(_Config) ->
 2929:     ?OK(#{fallback := false}, [], client),
 2930:     ?OK(#{fallback := true}, [{fallback, true}], client),
 2931: 
 2932:     %% Errors
 2933:     ?ERR({option, client_only, fallback},  [{fallback, true}], server),
 2934:     ?ERR({fallback, []},  [{fallback, []}], client),
 2935:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [fallback, {versions, _}]},
 2936:          [{fallback, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client),
 2937:     ok.

 2939: options_handshake(_Config) -> %% handshake
 2940:     ?OK(#{handshake := full, max_handshake_size := 131072},
 2941:         [], client),
 2942:     ?OK(#{handshake := hello, max_handshake_size := 123800},
 2943:         [{handshake, hello}, {max_handshake_size, 123800}], client),
 2944: 
 2945: 
 2946:     %% Errors
 2947:     ?ERR({handshake, []},  [{handshake, []}], server),
 2948:     ?ERR({max_handshake_size, 8388608},  [{max_handshake_size, 8388608}], server),
 2949:     ?ERR({max_handshake_size, -1}, [{handshake, hello}, {max_handshake_size, -1}], client),
 2950:     ok.

 2955:           receiver_spawn_opts := [{fullsweep_after, 500}],
 2956:           sender_spawn_opts := [{fullsweep_after, 500}]},
 2957:         [{hibernate_after, 10000},
 2958:          {receiver_spawn_opts,[{fullsweep_after, 500}]},
 2959:          {sender_spawn_opts, [{fullsweep_after, 500}]}],
 2960:         client),
 2961:     %% Errors
 2962:     ?ERR({hibernate_after, -1}, [{hibernate_after, -1}], server),
 2963:     ?ERR({receiver_spawn_opts, not_a_list}, [{receiver_spawn_opts, not_a_list}], server),
 2964:     ?ERR({sender_spawn_opts, not_a_list}, [{sender_spawn_opts, not_a_list}], server),
 2965:     ok.

 3062: options_identity(_Config) ->  %% psk_identity  srp_identity and user_lookup_fun
 3063:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 3064:         [], client),
 3065:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := <<"foobar">>, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 3066:         [{psk_identity, "foobar"}], server),
 3067:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 3068:         [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}}], client),
 3069:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := {_, args}},
 3070:         [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_,_) -> ok end, args}}], client),
 3071: 
 3072:     %% Should fail client option only
 3073:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 3074:         [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}}], server),
 3075: 
 3076:     %% Errors
 3077:     ?ERR({srp_identity, {_,_}},  %% FIXME doesn't like binary strings
 3078:          [{srp_identity, {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}}], client),
 3079:     ?ERR({psk_identity, _},  %% FIXME doesn't like binary strings
 3080:          [{psk_identity, <<"user">>}], client),
 3081:     ?ERR({srp_identity, _}, [{srp_identity, "user"}], client),
 3082:     ?ERR({user_lookup_fun, _},
 3083:          [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_) -> ok end, args}}],
 3084:          client),
 3085: 
 3086:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [psk_identity, _]},
 3087:          [{psk_identity, "foobar"},{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3088:          server),
 3089:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [srp_identity, _]},
 3090:          [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}},{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3091:          client),
 3092:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [user_lookup_fun, _]},
 3093:          [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_,_) -> ok end, args}}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3094:          client),
 3095:     ok.

 3097: options_reuse_session(_Config) ->
 3098:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := undefined, reuse_sessions := true}, [], client),
 3099:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := _, reuse_sessions := true}, [], server),
 3100: 
 3101:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := <<>>, reuse_sessions := save},
 3102:         [{reuse_session, <<>>}, {reuse_sessions, save}], client),
 3103:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := {<<>>, <<>>}, reuse_sessions := false},
 3104:         [{reuse_session, {<<>>, <<>>}}, {reuse_sessions, false}], client),
 3105: 
 3106:     RS_F = fun(_,_,_,_) -> ok end,
 3107:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := RS_F, reuse_sessions := false},
 3108:         [{reuse_session, RS_F}, {reuse_sessions, false}],
 3109:         server),
 3110: 
 3111:     %% Errors
 3112:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [reuse_session, _]},
 3113:          [{reuse_session, RS_F}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3114:          server),
 3115:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [reuse_sessions, _]},
 3116:          [{reuse_sessions, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3117:          server),
 3118:     ?ERR({reuse_session, RS_F},
 3119:          [{reuse_session, RS_F},{reuse_sessions, false}],
 3120:          client),
 3121:     ?ERR({reuse_sessions, foo},  [{reuse_sessions, foo}], server),
 3122:     ?ERR({reuse_session, foo},  [{reuse_session, foo}], server),
 3123:     ?ERR({reuse_sessions, save}, [{reuse_sessions, save}], server),
 3124:     ?ERR({reuse_session, <<>>}, [{reuse_session, <<>>}], server),
 3125: 
 3126:     ok.

 3128: options_sni(_Config) -> %% server_name_indication
 3129:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := "dummy.host.org"}, [], client),
 3130:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [server_name_indication]),
 3131:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := disable}, [{server_name_indication, disable}], client),
 3132:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := "dummy.org"}, [{server_name_indication, "dummy.org"}], client),
 3133: 
 3134:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := _}, [], server, [sni_hosts]),
 3135: 
 3136:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := _}, [{sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], server, [sni_hosts]),
 3137:     SNI_F = fun(_) -> sni end,
 3138:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := SNI_F}, [{sni_fun, SNI_F}], server, [sni_hosts]),
 3139: 
 3140:     %% Errors
 3141:     ?ERR({option, client_only, server_name_indication},
 3142:          [{server_name_indication, "dummy.org"}], server),
 3143:     ?ERR({option, server_only, sni_hosts},  [{sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], client),
 3144:     ?ERR({option, server_only, sni_fun},  [{sni_fun, SNI_F}], client),
 3145: 
 3146:     ?ERR({server_name_indication, foo},  [{server_name_indication, foo}], client),
 3147:     ?ERR({sni_hosts, foo}, [{sni_hosts, foo}], server),
 3148:     ?ERR({sni_fun, foo}, [{sni_fun, foo}], server),
 3149: 
 3150:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [sni_fun, sni_hosts]},
 3151:          [{sni_fun, SNI_F}, {sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], server),
 3152:     ok.

 3158:         [{signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,{sha512,rsa}]}], client),
 3159:     ?OK(#{signature_algs := [_|_], signature_algs_cert := [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]},
 3160:         [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}],
 3161:         client),
 3162: 
 3163:     %% Errors

 3165:     ?ERR({signature_algs_cert, not_a_list}, [{signature_algs_cert, not_a_list}], client),
 3166:     ?ERR({signature_algs, [foobar]}, [{signature_algs, [foobar]}], client),
 3167:     ?ERR({signature_algs_cert, [foobar]}, [{signature_algs_cert, [foobar]}], client),
 3168:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [signature_algs_cert, {versions, _}]},
 3169:          [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}, {versions, ['tlsv1.1']}],
 3170:          client),
 3171:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [signature_algs_cert, {versions, _}]},
 3172:          [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}, {versions, ['tlsv1.1']}],
 3173:          server),
 3174:     ?ERR({options, {no_supported_algorithms, {signature_algs,[]}}},
 3175:          [{signature_algs, []}], client),

 3177:          [{signature_algs_cert, []}],
 3178:          client),

 3181: options_supported_groups(_Config) ->
 3182:     Default = ssl:groups(default),
 3183:     ?OK(#{supported_groups := {supported_groups, Default}},
 3184:         [], client),
 3185:     ?OK(#{supported_groups := {supported_groups, [secp521r1, ffdhe2048]}},
 3186:         [{supported_groups, [secp521r1, ffdhe2048]}], client),
 3187: 
 3188:     %% ERRORs
 3189:     ?ERR({{'tlvs1.2'},{versions,[{'tlvs1.2'}]}},
 3190:          [{supported_groups, []}, {versions, [{'tlvs1.2'}]}], client),
 3191:     ?ERR({supported_groups, not_a_list}, [{supported_groups, not_a_list}], client),
 3192:     ?ERR({supported_groups, none_valid},  [{supported_groups, []}], client),
 3193:     ?ERR({supported_groups, none_valid},  [{supported_groups, [foo]}], client),
 3194:     ok.

 3196: options_use_srtp(_Config) ->
 3197:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki := <<>>}},
 3198:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3199:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>]}}], client),
 3200:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>], mki := <<>>}},
 3201:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3202:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>]}}], server),
 3203:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki := <<"123">>}},
 3204:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3205:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki => <<"123">>}}], client),
 3206:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>], mki := <<"123">>}},
 3207:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3208:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>], mki => <<"123">>}}], server),
 3209: 
 3210:     %% invalid parameters
 3211:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {no_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3212:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3213:           {use_srtp, #{}}], client),
 3214:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {no_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3215:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3216:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => []}}], client),
 3217:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {invalid_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3218:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3219:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<"bad">>]}}], client),
 3220:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {unknown_parameters,[whatever]}}},
 3221:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3222:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>], whatever => xxx}}], client),
 3223: 
 3224:     %% use_srtp is DTLS-only extension, by default setting its options should raise an error
 3225:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _},
 3226:          [{use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>]}}], client),
 3227:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _},
 3228:          [{use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>]}}], server),
 3229:     ok.
 3230: 
 3231: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3232: 
 3233: default_reject_anonymous()->
 3234:     [{doc,"Test that by default anonymous cipher suites are rejected "}].
 3235: default_reject_anonymous(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3236:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3237:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3238:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3239:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 3240:     TLSVersion = ssl_test_lib:tls_version(Version),
 3241:     
 3242:    [CipherSuite | _] = ssl_test_lib:ecdh_dh_anonymous_suites(TLSVersion),
 3243:     
 3244:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3245: 					      {from, self()},
 3246: 					      {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3247:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3248:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3249:                                               {host, Hostname},
 3250:                                               {from, self()},
 3251:                                               {options,
 3252:                                                [{ciphers,[CipherSuite]} |
 3253:                                                 ClientOpts]}]),
 3254: 
 3255:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, insufficient_security).
 3256: 
 3257: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3258: cb_info() ->
 3259:     [{doc,"Test that we can set cb_info."}].
 3260: 
 3261: cb_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3262:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 3263:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3264:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, Config, tls),
 3265:     CbInfo =
 3266:         case Protocol of
 3267:             tls ->
 3268:                 {cb_info, {gen_tcp, tcp, tcp_closed, tcp_error}};
 3269:             dtls ->
 3270:                 {cb_info, {gen_udp, udp, udp_closed, udp_error}}
 3271:         end,
 3272:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3273:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3274:                                         {from, self()},
 3275:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3276:                                         {options,  [CbInfo | ServerOpts]}]),
 3277:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3278: 
 3279:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3280:                                         {host, Hostname},
 3281:                                         {from, self()},
 3282:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3283:                                         {options, [CbInfo | ClientOpts]}]),
 3284: 
 3285:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3286: 
 3287: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3288: log_alert() ->
 3289:     [{doc,"Test that we can set log_alert and that it translates to correct log_level" 
 3290:       " that has replaced this option"}].
 3291: 
 3292: log_alert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3293:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 3294:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3295: 
 3296:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3297:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3298:                                         {from, self()},
 3299:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3300:                                         {options,  [{log_alert, true} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3301:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3302:     {Client, CSock} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 3303:                                                  {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3304:                                                  {host, Hostname},
 3305:                                                  {from, self()},
 3306:                                                  {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3307:                                                  {options, [{log_alert, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 3308:     
 3309:     {ok, [{log_level, none}]} = ssl:connection_information(CSock, [log_level]),
 3310:     
 3311:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3312: 
 3313: 
 3314: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3315: %% Note that these test only test that the options are valid to set. As application data
 3316: %% is a stream you can not test that the send acctually splits it up as when it arrives
 3317: %% again at the user layer it may be concatenated. But COVER can show that the split up
 3318: %% code has been run.
 3319:    
 3320: rizzo_disabled() ->
 3321:      [{doc, "Test original beast mitigation disable option for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3322: 
 3323: rizzo_disabled(Config) ->
 3324:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, disabled} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3325:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, disabled} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3326:     
 3327:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3328: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3329: rizzo_zero_n() ->
 3330:      [{doc, "Test zero_n beast mitigation option (same affect as original disable option) for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3331: 
 3332: rizzo_zero_n(Config) ->
 3333:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, zero_n} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3334:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, zero_n} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3335:     
 3336:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3337: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3338: rizzo_one_n_minus_one () ->
 3339:      [{doc, "Test beast_mitigation option one_n_minus_one (same affect as default) for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3340: 
 3341: rizzo_one_n_minus_one (Config) ->
 3342:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one } | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3343:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3344:     
 3345:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3346:

 3349: supported_groups() ->
 3350:     [{doc,"Test the supported_groups option in TLS 1.3."}].
 3351: 
 3352: supported_groups(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3353:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3354:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3355: 
 3356:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3357: 
 3358:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3359: 					{from, self()},
 3360:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3361:                                         {options, [{supported_groups, [x448, x25519]} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3362:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3363:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3364: 					{host, Hostname},
 3365:                                         {from, self()},
 3366:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3367:                                         {options, [{supported_groups,[x448]} | ClientOpts]}]),
 3368: 
 3369:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 3370: 
 3371:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 3372:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).

 3375: honor_client_cipher_order_tls13() ->
 3376:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order in TLS 1.3."}].
 3377: honor_client_cipher_order_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3378:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3379:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3380:                        mac => aead,
 3381:                        prf => sha384},
 3382:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3383:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3384:                        mac => aead,
 3385:                        prf => sha256}],
 3386:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3387:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3388:                        mac => aead,
 3389:                        prf => sha256},
 3390:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3391:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3392:                        mac => aead,
 3393:                        prf => sha384}],
 3394:     honor_cipher_order(Config, false, ServerCiphers, ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => any,
 3395:                                                                       cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3396:                                                                       mac => aead,
 3397:                                                                       prf => sha384}).

 3401:     [{doc,"Test client options with faulty version gap."}].
 3402: client_options_negative_version_gap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3403:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.3']}],
 3404:                           {options, missing_version, 
 3405:                            {'tlsv1.2', {versions,[tlsv1, 'tlsv1.3']}}}).

 3412:                                    {session_tickets, manual}],
 3413:                           {options,incompatible,
 3414:                            [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1']}]}).

 3445:                           {options,incompatible,

 3449:                                    {session_tickets, stateful},
 3450:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3451:                           {options, {session_tickets, stateful}}),

 3454:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3455:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3456:                           {options,incompatible,
 3457:                            [early_data, {session_tickets, manual}, {use_ticket, undefined}]}),

 3460:                                    {use_ticket, [<<"ticket">>]},

 3462:                           {options, {early_data, "test"}}),
 3463:     %% All options are ok but there is no server
 3464:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3465:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3466:                                    {use_ticket, [<<"ticket">>]},
 3467:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3468:                           econnrefused),
 3469: 
 3470:     %% All options are ok but there is no server
 3471:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3472:                                    {session_tickets, auto},
 3473:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3474:                           econnrefused).

 3524:                                    {stateless_tickets_seed, Seed}],

 3529:                                    {session_tickets, disabled},

 3532:                            [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, disabled}]}),

 3535:                                    {session_tickets, stateful},
 3536:                                    {stateless_tickets_seed, Seed}],
 3537:                           {options, incompatible,
 3538:                            [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, stateful}]}),
 3539: 
 3540:     InvalidSeed1 = 12345,
 3541:     start_server_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3542:                                    {session_tickets, stateless},
 3543:                                    {stateless_tickets_seed, InvalidSeed1}],
 3544:                           {options, {stateless_tickets_seed, InvalidSeed1}}).
