 3547: honor_server_cipher_order_tls13() ->
 3548:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order in TLS 1.3."}].
 3549: honor_server_cipher_order_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3550:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3551:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3552:                        mac => aead,
 3553:                        prf => sha384},
 3554:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3555:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3556:                        mac => aead,
 3557:                        prf => sha256}],
 3558:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3559:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3560:                        mac => aead,
 3561:                        prf => sha256},
 3562:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3563:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3564:                        mac => aead,
 3565:                        prf => sha384}],
 3566:     honor_cipher_order(Config, true, ServerCiphers,
 3567:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => any,
 3568:                                         cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3569:                                         mac => aead,
 3570:                                         prf => sha256}).
 3571: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3572: getstat() ->
 3573:     [{doc, "Test that you use ssl:getstat on a TLS socket"}].
 3574: 
 3575: getstat(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
 3576:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3577:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3578:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3579:     
 3580:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
 3581:     {ok, ListenSocket} = ssl:listen(Port0, [ServerOpts]),
 3582:     {ok, _} = ssl:getstat(ListenSocket),
 3583:     ssl:close(ListenSocket),
 3584: 
 3585:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
 3586: 					{from, self()},
 3587:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_getstat, []}},
 3588:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3589:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3590:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
 3591: 					{host, Hostname},
 3592:                                         {from, self()},
 3593:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_getstat, []}},
 3594:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3595:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3596: 
 3597: invalid_options_tls13() ->
 3598:     [{doc, "Test invalid options with TLS 1.3"}].
 3599: invalid_options_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3600:     TestOpts =
 3601:         [{{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one},
 3602:           {options, incompatible,
 3603:            [beast_mitigation,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3604:           common},
 3605: 
 3606:          {{next_protocols_advertised, [<<"http/1.1">>]},
 3607:           {options, incompatible,
 3608:            [next_protocols_advertised, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3609:           server},
 3610: 
 3611:          {{client_preferred_next_protocols,
 3612:            {client, [<<"http/1.1">>]}},
 3613:           {options, incompatible,
 3614:            [client_preferred_next_protocols, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3615:           client},
 3616: 
 3617:          {{client_renegotiation, false},
 3618:           {options, incompatible,
 3619:            [client_renegotiation, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3620:           server
 3621:          },
 3622: 
 3623:          {{cookie, false},
 3624:           {option , server_only, cookie},
 3625:           client
 3626:          },
 3627: 
 3628:          {{padding_check, false},
 3629:           {options, incompatible, [padding_check,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3630:           common},
 3631: 
 3632:          {{psk_identity, "Test-User"},
 3633:           {options, incompatible, [psk_identity,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3634:           common},
 3635: 
 3636:          {{user_lookup_fun,
 3637:            {fun ssl_test_lib:user_lookup/3, <<1,2,3>>}},
 3638:           {options, incompatible, [user_lookup_fun,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3639:           common},
 3640: 
 3641:          {{reuse_session, fun(_,_,_,_) -> false end},
 3642:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_session, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3643:           server},
 3644: 
 3645:          {{reuse_session, <<1,2,3,4>>},
 3646:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_session, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3647:           client},
 3648: 
 3649:          {{reuse_sessions, true},
 3650:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_sessions, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3651:           common},
 3652: 
 3653:          {{secure_renegotiate, false},
 3654:           {options, incompatible, [secure_renegotiate, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3655:           common},
 3656: 
 3657:          {{srp_identity, {"user", "passwd"}},
 3658:           {options, incompatible, [srp_identity, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3659:           client}
 3660:         ],
 3661: 
 3662:     Fun = fun(Option, ErrorMsg, Type) ->
 3663:                   case Type of
 3664:                       server ->
 3665:                           start_server_negative(Config,
 3666:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3667:                                                 ErrorMsg);
 3668:                       client ->
 3669:                           start_client_negative(Config,
 3670:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3671:                                                 ErrorMsg);
 3672:                       common ->
 3673:                           start_server_negative(Config,
 3674:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3675:                                                 ErrorMsg),
 3676:                           start_client_negative(Config,
 3677:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3678:                                                 ErrorMsg)
 3679:                   end
 3680:           end,
 3681:     [Fun(Option, ErrorMsg, Type) || {Option, ErrorMsg, Type} <- TestOpts].
 3682: 
 3683: 
 3684: ssl_not_started() ->
 3685:     [{doc, "Test that an error is returned if ssl is not started"}].
 3686: ssl_not_started(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3687:     application:stop(ssl),
 3688:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, Config, tls),
 3689:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 3690:     Opts = [{verify, verify_none},
 3691:             {versions, [Version]},
 3692:             {protocol, Protocol}],
 3693:     try
 3694:         {error, ssl_not_started} = ssl:connect("localhost", 22, Opts)
 3695:     after
 3696:         ssl:start()
 3697:     end,
 3698:     ok.
 3699: 
 3700: cookie() ->
 3701:     [{doc, "Test cookie extension in TLS 1.3"}].
 3702: cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3703:     cookie_extension(Config, true),
 3704:     cookie_extension(Config, false).
 3705: 
 3706: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3707: check_random_nonce() ->
 3708:     [{doc,"Test random nonce - expecting 32B random for TLS1.3 and 4B UTC "
 3709:       "epoch with 28B random for older version"}].
 3710: check_random_nonce(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3711:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3712:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3713:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3714:     N = 10,
 3715:     F = fun (Id) -> establish_connection(Id,ServerNode, ServerOpts,
 3716:                                          ClientNode, ClientOpts,
 3717:                                          Hostname)
 3718:         end,
 3719:     ConnectionPairs = [F(Id) || Id <- lists:seq(1, N)],
 3720:     Randoms = lists:flatten([ssl_test_lib:get_result([Server, Client]) ||
 3721:                                 {Server, Client} <- ConnectionPairs]),
 3722:     Deltas = [abs(FourBytes - SecsSince) ||
 3723:                  {_FromPid,
 3724:                   {_Id, {_, <<FourBytes:32, _/binary>>}, SecsSince}} <- Randoms],
 3725:     MeanDelta = lists:sum(Deltas) div N,
 3726:     case ?config(version, Config) of
 3727:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3728:             %% 4B "random" expected since TLS1.3
 3729:             RndThreshold   = 10000,
 3730:             true = MeanDelta > RndThreshold;
 3731:         _ ->
 3732:             %% 4 epoch based bytes expected pre TLS1.3
 3733:             EpochThreshold = 10,
 3734:             true = MeanDelta < EpochThreshold
 3735:     end,
 3736:     [begin
 3737:          ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 3738:          ssl_test_lib:close(Client)
 3739:      end || {Server, Client} <- ConnectionPairs].
 3740: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3741: cipher_listing() ->
 3742:     [{doc, "Check that exclusive cipher for possible supported version adds up to all cipher " 
 3743:       "for the max version. Note that TLS-1.3 will contain two distinct sets of ciphers "
 3744:       "one for TLS-1.3 and one pre TLS-1.3"}].
 3745: cipher_listing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3746:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, tuple),
 3747:     length_exclusive(Version) == length_all(Version).
 3748: 
 3749: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3750: format_error() ->
 3751:     "".
 3752: format_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3753:     Errors = [{error, enotconn},
 3754:               {error, closed},
 3755:               {options, {keyfile, "TestFileName", {error,enoent}}},
 3756:               {options, {certfile, "TestFileName", {error,enoent}}},
 3757:               {options, {cacertfile, "TestFileName",{error,enoent}}},
 3758:               {options, {option_not_a_key_value_tuple, [foo]}},
 3759:               {options, {insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3','tlsv1.1'}}},
 3760:               {options, incompatible, [{verify,verify_peer},{cacerts,undefined}]},
 3761:               {options, {protocol, foo}},
 3762:               {option, server_only, alpn_preferred_protocols},
 3763:               {options, {alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}},
 3764:               {options, missing_version, {'tlsv1.2',{versions, ['tlsv1.1','tlsv1.3']}}},
 3765:               {options, {no_supported_algorithms, {signature_algs,[]}}},
 3766:               {options, {no_supported_signature_schemes, {signature_algs_cert,[]}}}
 3767:              ],
 3768:     Check = fun(Err) ->
 3769:                     Str = ssl:format_error(Err),
 3770:                     io:format("~p => ~s ~n", [Err, Str]),
 3771:                     %% Verify flat string (why do ssl flatten strings?)
 3772:                     Str = [C || C <- Str, is_integer(C)]
 3773:             end,
 3774:     [Check(Err) || Err <- Errors],
 3775:     ok.
 3776: 
 3777: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3778: 
 3779: export_key_materials() ->
 3780:     [{doc, "Test export_key_materials/4,5"}].
 3781: 
 3782: export_key_materials(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3783:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3784:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3785:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3786:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3787:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3788: 
 3789:     Label = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp">>,
 3790: 
 3791:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3792:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3793:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3794:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3795:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3796:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3797:     Server ! get_socket,
 3798:     ServerS = receive
 3799:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3800:               end,
 3801: 
 3802:     case Version of
 3803:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3804:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [<<>>], [32], false),
 3805:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [<<>>], [32], false),
 3806:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [no_context], [32]),
 3807:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [no_context], [32]);
 3808:         _ ->
 3809:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial1} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [<<>>], [20]),
 3810:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial1} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [<<>>], [20]),
 3811:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial2} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [no_context], [20]),
 3812:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial2} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [no_context], [20]),
 3813:             true = ExportKeyMaterial1 =/= ExportKeyMaterial2
 3814:     end.
 3815: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3816: exporter_master_secret_consumed() ->
 3817:     [{doc, "Test export_key_materials/4,5 TLS-1.3 functionality"}].
 3818: 
 3819: exporter_master_secret_consumed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3820:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3821:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3822:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3823:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3824:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3825: 
 3826:     Label1 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp1">>,
 3827:     Label2 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp2">>,
 3828:     Label3 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp3">>,
 3829:     Label4 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp4">>,
 3830: 
 3831:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3832:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3833:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3834:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3835:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3836:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3837:     Server ! get_socket,
 3838:     ServerS = receive
 3839:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3840:               end,
 3841: 
 3842:     {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label1, Label2], [<<>>, <<>>], [32, 32]),
 3843:     {error, exporter_master_secret_already_consumed} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label3], [<<>>], [32]),
 3844:     {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label1, Label2], [<<>>, <<>>], [32, 32], false),
 3845:     {error, bad_input} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label3, Label4], [<<>>], [32]).
 3846: 
 3847: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3848: 
 3849: legacy_prf() ->
 3850:     [{doc, "Test prf/5"}].
 3851: 
 3852: legacy_prf(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3853:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3854:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3855:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3856:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3857:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3858: 
 3859:    {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3860:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3861:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3862:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3863:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3864: 
 3865:     Label = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp">>,
 3866: 
 3867:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 3868:                     [return_socket,
 3869:                      {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3870:                      {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3871:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3872:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3873:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3874:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3875: 
 3876:     Server ! get_socket,
 3877:     ServerS = receive
 3878:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3879:               end,
 3880: 
 3881:     case Version of
 3882:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3883:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3884:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:prf(ClientS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32);
 3885:         _ ->
 3886:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials1} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random], 32),
 3887:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials1} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random], 32),
 3888:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials2} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3889:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials2} = ssl:prf(ClientS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3890:             true = ExportKeyMaterials1 =/= ExportKeyMaterials2
 3891:     end.
 3892: 
 3893: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3894: 
 3895: establish_connection(Id, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts, Hostname) ->
 3896:     Server =
 3897:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3898:                                    {from, self()},
 3899:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, get_connection_information,
 3900:                                           [Id, server_random]}},
 3901:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3902: 
 3903:     ListenPort = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3904:     Client =
 3905:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, ListenPort},
 3906:                                    {host, Hostname},
 3907:                                    {from, self()},
 3908:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, get_connection_information,
 3909:                                           [Id, client_random]}},
 3910:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer} |ClientOpts]}]),
 3911: 
 3912:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 3913:     {Server, Client}.
 3914: 
 3915: %%% Checker functions
 3916: get_connection_information(Socket, ConnectionId, InfoType) ->
 3917:     {ok, [ConnectionInfo]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [InfoType]),
 3918:     {ConnectionId, ConnectionInfo, secs_since_1970()}.
 3919: secs_since_1970() ->
 3920:     calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(
 3921:         calendar:universal_time()) - 62167219200.
 3922: 
 3923: connection_information_result(Socket) ->
 3924:     {ok, Info = [_ | _]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket),
 3925:     case  length(Info) > 3 of
 3926: 	true -> 
 3927: 	    %% At least one ssl_option() is set
 3928: 	    ?CT_LOG("Info ~p", [Info]),
 3929: 	    ok;
 3930: 	false ->
 3931: 	    ct:fail(no_ssl_options_returned)
 3932:     end.
 3933: 
 3934: secret_connection_info_result(Socket) ->
 3935:     {ok, [{protocol, Protocol}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]),
 3936:     {ok, ConnInfo} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [client_random, server_random, master_secret]),
 3937:     check_connection_info(Protocol, ConnInfo).
 3938: 
 3939: keylog_connection_info_result(Socket, KeepSecrets) ->
 3940:     {ok, [{protocol, Protocol}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]),
 3941:     {ok, ConnInfo} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [keylog]),
 3942:     check_keylog_info(Protocol, ConnInfo, KeepSecrets).
 3943: 
 3944: check_keylog_info('tlsv1.3', [{keylog, ["CLIENT_HANDSHAKE_TRAFFIC_SECRET"++_,_|_]=Keylog}], true) ->
 3945:     {ok, Keylog};
 3946: check_keylog_info('tlsv1.3', []=Keylog, false) ->
 3947:     {ok, Keylog};
 3948: check_keylog_info(_, [{keylog, ["CLIENT_RANDOM"++_]=Keylog}], _) ->
 3949:     {ok, Keylog};
 3950: check_keylog_info(_, Unexpected, Keep) ->
 3951:     {unexpected, Keep, Unexpected}.
 3952: 
 3953: check_srp_in_connection_information(_Socket, _Username, client) ->
 3954:     ok;
 3955: check_srp_in_connection_information(Socket, Username, server) ->
 3956:     {ok, Info} = ssl:connection_information(Socket),
 3957:     ?CT_LOG("Info ~p~n", [Info]),
 3958:     case proplists:get_value(srp_username, Info, not_found) of
 3959:         Username ->
 3960: 	        ok;
 3961:         not_found ->
 3962:             ct:fail(srp_username_not_found)
 3963:     end.
 3964: 
 3965: %% In TLS 1.3 the master_secret field is used to store multiple secrets from the key schedule and it is a tuple.
 3966: %% client_random and server_random are not used in the TLS 1.3 key schedule.
 3967: check_connection_info('tlsv1.3', [{client_random, ClientRand},{server_random, ServerRand},
 3968:                                   {master_secret, {master_secret, MasterSecret}}]) ->
 3969:     is_binary(ClientRand) andalso is_binary(ServerRand) andalso is_binary(MasterSecret);
 3970: check_connection_info(_, [{client_random, ClientRand}, {server_random, ServerRand}, {master_secret, MasterSecret}]) ->
 3971:     is_binary(ClientRand) andalso is_binary(ServerRand) andalso is_binary(MasterSecret);
 3972: check_connection_info(_, _) ->
 3973:     false.
 3974: 
 3975: try_recv_active(Socket) ->
 3976:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello world"),
 3977:     {error, einval} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 3978:     ok.
 3979: try_recv_active_once(Socket) ->
 3980:     {error, einval} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 3981:     ok.
 3982: 
 3983: controlling_process_result(Socket, Pid, Msg) ->
 3984:     ok = ssl:controlling_process(Socket, Pid),
 3985:     %% Make sure other side has evaluated controlling_process
 3986:     %% before message is sent
 3987:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 3988:     ssl:send(Socket, Msg),
 3989:     no_result_msg.
 3990: 
 3991: controller_dies_result(_Socket, _Pid, _Msg) ->
 3992:     receive Result -> Result end.
 3993: send_recv_result_timeout_client(Socket) ->
 3994:     try ssl:recv(Socket, 11, not_infinity) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 3995:     try ssl:recv(Socket, 11, -1) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 3996:     try ssl:recv(Socket, not_integer, 500) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 3997:     try ssl:recv(Socket, -1, 500) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 3998:     {error, timeout} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 500),
 3999:     {error, timeout} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 0),
 4000:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello world"),
 4001:     receive
 4002: 	Msg ->
 4003: 	    io:format("Msg ~p~n",[Msg])
 4004:     after 500 ->
 4005: 	    ok
 4006:     end,
 4007:     {ok, "Hello world"} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 500),
 4008:     ok.
 4009: send_recv_result_timeout_server(Socket) ->
 4010:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello"),
 4011:     {ok, "Hello world"} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 4012:     ssl:send(Socket, " world"),
 4013:     ok.
 4014: 
 4015: do_recv_close(Socket) ->
 4016:     {error, closed} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 4017:     receive
 4018: 	{_,{error,closed}} ->
 4019: 	    error_extra_close_sent_to_user_process
 4020:     after 500 ->
 4021: 	    ok
 4022:     end.
 4023: 
 4024: tls_close(Socket) ->
 4025:     ok = ssl_test_lib:send_recv_result(Socket),
 4026:     %% So both sides will have time to send
 4027:     %% and recv before close is called, as this
 4028:     %% function will be called by both client
 4029:     %% and server in the test.
 4030:     ct:sleep(100),
 4031:     case ssl:close(Socket, 10000) of
 4032:         ok ->
 4033:             ok;
 4034:         {error, closed} ->
 4035:             ok;
 4036:         Other ->
 4037:             ct:fail(Other)
 4038:     end.
 4039: 
 4040: run_error_server_close([Pid | Opts]) ->
 4041:     {ok, Listen} = ssl:listen(0, Opts),
 4042:     {ok,{_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(Listen),
 4043:     Pid ! {self(), Port},
 4044:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:transport_accept(Listen),
 4045:     Pid ! ssl:close(Socket).
 4046: 
 4047: run_error_server([ Pid | Opts]) ->
 4048:     {ok, Listen} = ssl:listen(0, Opts),
 4049:     {ok,{_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(Listen),
 4050:     Pid ! {self(), Port},
 4051:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:transport_accept(Listen),
 4052:     Pid ! ssl:controlling_process(Socket, self()).
 4053: 
 4054: run_client_error([Port, Opts]) ->
 4055:     ssl:connect("localhost", Port, Opts).
 4056: 
 4057: no_recv_no_active(Socket) ->
 4058:     receive
 4059:         {ssl_closed, Socket} ->
 4060:             ct:fail(received_active_msg)
 4061:     after 5000 ->
 4062:             ok
 4063:     end.
 4064: 
 4065: connection_info_result(Socket) ->
 4066:     {ok, Info} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol, selected_cipher_suite]),
 4067:     {ok, {proplists:get_value(protocol, Info), proplists:get_value(selected_cipher_suite, Info)}}.
 4068: 
 4069: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 4070: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 4071: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 4072: 
 4073: tls_or_dtls('dtlsv1') ->
 4074:     dtls;
 4075: tls_or_dtls('dtlsv1.2') ->
 4076:     dtls;
 4077: tls_or_dtls(_) ->
 4078:     tls.
 4079: 
 4080: active_n_common(S, N) ->
 4081:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-N}]),
 4082:     receive
 4083:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 4084:     after
 4085:         1000 ->
 4086:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 4087:     end,
 4088:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4089:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,0}]),
 4090:     receive
 4091:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 4092:     after
 4093:         1000 ->
 4094:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 4095:     end,
 4096:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,32767}]),
 4097:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,1}]),
 4098:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-32769}]),
 4099:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-32768}]),
 4100:     receive
 4101:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 4102:     after
 4103:         1000 ->
 4104:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 4105:     end,
 4106:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4107:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 4108:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,true}]),
 4109:     [{active,true}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4110:     receive
 4111:         _ -> error({error,active_n})
 4112:     after
 4113:         0 ->
 4114:             ok
 4115:     end,
 4116:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 4117:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,once}]),
 4118:     [{active,once}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4119:     receive
 4120:         _ -> error({error,active_n})
 4121:     after
 4122:         0 ->
 4123:             ok
 4124:     end,
 4125:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,32768}]),
 4126:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,false}]),
 4127:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4128:     ok.
 4129: 
 4130: ok({ok,V}) -> V.
 4131: 
 4132: repeat(N, Fun) ->
 4133:     Repeat = fun F(Arg) when is_integer(Arg), Arg > 0 -> Fun(N - Arg), F(Arg - 1);
 4134:                         F(_) -> ok end,
 4135:     Repeat(N).
 4136: 
 4137: 
 4138: get_close(Pid, Where) ->
 4139:     receive
 4140: 	{'EXIT', Pid, _Reason} ->
 4141: 	    receive
 4142: 		{_, {ssl_closed, Socket}} ->
 4143: 		    ?CT_LOG("Socket closed ~p~n",[Socket]);
 4144: 		Unexpected ->
 4145: 		    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 4146: 		    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 4147: 	    after 5000 ->
 4148: 		    ct:fail({timeout, {line, ?LINE, Where}})
 4149: 	    end;
 4150: 	Unexpected ->
 4151: 	    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 4152: 	    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 4153:     after 5000 ->
 4154: 	    ct:fail({timeout, {line, ?LINE, Where}})
 4155:     end.
 4156: 
 4157: ssl_active_recv(N) ->
 4158:     ssl_active_recv(N, []).
 4159: 
 4160: ssl_active_recv(0, Acc) ->
 4161:     Acc;
 4162: ssl_active_recv(N, Acc) ->
 4163:     receive 
 4164: 	{ssl, _, Bytes} ->
 4165:             ssl_active_recv(N-length(Bytes),  Acc ++ Bytes)
 4166:     end.
 4167: 
 4168: 
 4169: 
 4170: honor_cipher_order(Config, Honor, ServerCiphers, ClientCiphers, Expected) ->
 4171:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4172:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4173: 
 4174:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4175: 
 4176:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4177: 					{from, self()},
 4178: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4179: 					{options, [{ciphers, ServerCiphers}, {honor_cipher_order, Honor}
 4180: 						   | ServerOpts]}]),
 4181:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4182:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4183: 					{host, Hostname},
 4184: 					{from, self()},
 4185: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4186: 					{options, [{ciphers, ClientCiphers}
 4187: 						   | ClientOpts]}]),
 4188: 
 4189:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 4190: 
 4191:     ServerMsg = ClientMsg = {ok, {Version, Expected}},
 4192: 
 4193:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
 4194: 
 4195:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 4196:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 4197: 
 4198: cookie_extension(Config, Cookie) ->
 4199:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4200:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4201:     Data = "123456789012345",  %% 15 bytes
 4202: 
 4203:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4204: 
 4205:     %% Trigger a HelloRetryRequest
 4206:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4207: 					{from, self()},
 4208: 					{options, [{supported_groups, [x448,
 4209:                                                                        secp256r1,
 4210:                                                                        secp384r1]},
 4211:                                                    {cookie, Cookie}|ServerOpts]}]),
 4212:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4213:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4214: 					{host, Hostname},
 4215: 					{from, self()},
 4216: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
 4217: 
 4218:     ok = ssl_test_lib:send(Client, Data),
 4219:     Data = ssl_test_lib:check_active_receive(Server, Data),
 4220: 
 4221:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 4222:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 4223: 
 4224: start_client_negative(Config, Options, Error) ->
 4225:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4226:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4227:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
 4228:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4229: 					{host, Hostname},
 4230: 					{from, self()},
 4231:                                         {return_error, econnrefused},
 4232: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4233: 					{options, Options ++ ClientOpts}]),
 4234:     ?CT_LOG("Actual: ~p~nExpected: ~p", [Client, {connect_failed, Error}]),
 4235:     {connect_failed, Error} = Client.
 4236: 
 4237: start_server_negative(Config, Options, Error) ->
 4238:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4239:     {_, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4240:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4241: 					{from, self()},
 4242: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4243: 					{options,  Options ++ ServerOpts}]),
 4244: 
 4245:     ?CT_LOG("Actual: ~p~nExpected: ~p", [Server,Error]),
 4246:     Error = Server.
 4247: 
 4248: der_input_opts(Opts) ->
 4249:     Certfile = proplists:get_value(certfile, Opts),
 4250:     CaCertsfile = proplists:get_value(cacertfile, Opts),
 4251:     Keyfile = proplists:get_value(keyfile, Opts),
 4252:     Dhfile = proplists:get_value(dhfile, Opts),
 4253:     [{_, Cert, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Certfile),
 4254:     [{Asn1Type, Key, _}]  = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Keyfile),
 4255:     [{_, DHParams, _}]  = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Dhfile),
 4256:     CaCerts =
 4257: 	lists:map(fun(Entry) ->
 4258: 			  {_, CaCert, _} = Entry,
 4259: 			  CaCert
 4260: 		  end, ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CaCertsfile)),
 4261:     {Cert, {Asn1Type, Key}, CaCerts, DHParams}.
 4262: 
 4263: ssl_getstat(Socket) ->
 4264:     ssl:send(Socket, "From Erlang to Erlang"),
 4265:     {ok, Stats} = ssl:getstat(Socket),
 4266:     List = lists:dropwhile(fun({_, 0}) ->
 4267:                                    true;
 4268:                               ({_, _}) ->
 4269:                                    false
 4270:                            end, Stats),
 4271:     case List of
 4272:         [] ->
 4273:             nok;
 4274:         _  ->
 4275:             ok
 4276:     end.
 4277: 
 4278: test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni('tlsv1.3') ->
 4279:     {'tlsv1.2', ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']};
 4280: test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni('tlsv1.2') ->
 4281:     {'tlsv1.1', ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1']}.
 4282: 
 4283: protocol_version_check(Socket, Version) ->
 4284:     case ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]) of
 4285:         {ok, [{protocol, Version}]} ->
 4286:             ok;
 4287:         Other ->
 4288:             ct:fail({expected, Version, got, Other})
 4289:     end.
 4290: 
 4291: log(#{msg:={report,_Report}},#{config:=Pid}) ->
 4292:     Pid ! warning_generated;
 4293: log(_,_) ->
 4294:     ok.
 4295: 
 4296: length_exclusive(Version) when ?TLS_1_X(Version) ->
 4297:     length(exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version)) +
 4298:         length(exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version));
 4299: length_exclusive(Version) when ?DTLS_1_X(Version)->
 4300:     length(dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version)) +
 4301:         length(dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version)).
 4302: 
 4303: length_all(Version) ->
 4304:     length(ssl:cipher_suites(all, Version)).
 4305: 
 4306: exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4307:     lists:flatmap(fun (Vsn) -> ssl:cipher_suites(exclusive, Vsn) end
 4308:                  , exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4309: 
 4310: exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_3) -> [?TLS_1_3, ?TLS_1_2, ?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4311: exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_2) -> [?TLS_1_2, ?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4312: exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_1) -> [?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4313: exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_0) -> [?TLS_1_0].
 4314: 
 4315: 
 4316: 
 4317: dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4318:     lists:flatmap( fun (Vsn) -> ssl:cipher_suites(exclusive, Vsn) end
 4319:                  , dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4320: 
 4321: dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?DTLS_1_2) -> [?DTLS_1_0, ?DTLS_1_2];
 4322: dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?DTLS_1_0) -> [?DTLS_1_0].
 4323: 
 4324: 
 4325: 
 4326: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4327:     lists:flatmap(fun exclusive_non_default_version/1
 4328:                  , exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4329: 
 4330: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_3) -> [?TLS_1_2, ?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4331: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_2) -> [?TLS_1_2, ?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4332: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_1) -> [?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4333: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_0) -> [?TLS_1_0].
 4334: 
 4335: 
 4336: dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4337:     lists:flatmap( fun dtls_exclusive_non_default_version/1
 4338:                  , dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4339: 
 4340: dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?DTLS_1_2) -> [?DTLS_1_0, ?DTLS_1_2];
 4341: dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?DTLS_1_0) -> [?DTLS_1_0].
 4342: 
 4343: 
 4344: exclusive_non_default_version(Version) ->
 4345:     Ls = [ fun tls_v1:psk_exclusive/1
 4346:          , fun tls_v1:srp_exclusive/1
 4347:          , fun tls_v1:rsa_exclusive/1
 4348:          , fun tls_v1:des_exclusive/1
 4349:          , fun tls_v1:rc4_exclusive/1],
 4350:     lists:flatmap(fun(Fn) -> Fn(Version) end, Ls).
 4351: 
 4352: dtls_exclusive_non_default_version(DTLSVersion) ->        
 4353:     Version = ssl:tls_version(DTLSVersion),
 4354:     Fns = [ fun tls_v1:psk_exclusive/1
 4355:           , fun tls_v1:srp_exclusive/1
 4356:           , fun tls_v1:rsa_exclusive/1
 4357:           , fun tls_v1:des_exclusive/1],
 4358:     lists:flatmap(fun (Fn) -> Fn(Version) end, Fns).
 4359: 
 4360: selected_peer(ExpectedClient,
 4361:               ExpectedServer, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config) ->
 4362:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4363: 
 4364:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4365: 					{from, self()},
 4366:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_peercert, [ExpectedServer]}},
 4367:                                         {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ServerOpts, Config)}]),
 4368:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4369: 
 4370:     Client  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4371:                                          {host, Hostname},
 4372:                                          {from, self()},
 4373:                                          {mfa, {?MODULE, check_peercert, [ExpectedClient]}},
 4374:                                          {options,  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ClientOpts, Config)}
 4375: 					]),
 4376: 
 4377:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 4378:     %% Make sure to start next test fresh
 4379:     ssl:stop(),
 4380:     ssl:start().
 4381: 
 4382: test_config('tlsv1.3', _) ->
 4383:     #{server_config := SEDDSAOpts,
 4384:       client_config := CEDDSAOpts} = eddsa_cert_chains(),
 4385:     #{server_config := SECDSAOpts,
 4386:       client_config := CECDSAOpts } = ecdsa_cert_chains(),
 4387: 
 4388:     {SEDDSACert, SEDDSAKey, SEDDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SEDDSAOpts),
 4389:     {CEDDSACert, CEDDSAKey, CEDDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, CEDDSAOpts),
 4390: 
 4391:     {SECDSACert, SECDSAKey, SECDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SECDSAOpts),
 4392:     {CECDSACert, CECDSAKey, CECDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, CECDSAOpts),
 4393: 
 4394:     ServerCertKeys = [#{cert => SECDSACert, key => SECDSAKey},
 4395:                       #{cert => SEDDSACert, key => SEDDSAKey}],
 4396: 
 4397:     ClientCertKeys = [#{cert => CECDSACert, key => CECDSAKey},
 4398:                       #{cert => CEDDSACert, key => CEDDSAKey}],
 4399: 
 4400:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys,ServerCertKeys},
 4401:                           {verify, verify_peer},  {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4402:                           {cacerts, SEDDSACACerts ++ SECDSACACerts}],
 4403:         client_config => [{certs_keys, ClientCertKeys},
 4404:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4405:                           {cacerts, CEDDSACACerts ++ CECDSACACerts}]
 4406:        },
 4407:       {client_peer, SEDDSACert}, {server_peer, CEDDSACert}},
 4408:      {#{server_config => [{certs_keys, ServerCertKeys},
 4409:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4410:                           {cacerts, SEDDSACACerts ++ SECDSACACerts}],
 4411:         client_config => [{certs_keys, ClientCertKeys},
 4412:                           {verify, verify_peer},  {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4413:                           {cacerts, CEDDSACACerts ++ CECDSACACerts}]},
 4414:       {client_peer, SECDSACert}, {server_peer, CECDSACert}}
 4415:     ];
 4416: test_config('tlsv1.2', _) ->
 4417:     #{server_config := SRSAOpts,
 4418:       client_config := CRSAOpts} = eddsa_cert_chains(),
 4419:     #{server_config := SDSAOpts,
 4420:       client_config := CDSAOpts} = dsa_cert_chains(),
 4421: 
 4422:     {SRSACert, SRSAKey, SRSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SRSAOpts),
 4423:     {CRSACert, CRSAKey, CRSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts,  CRSAOpts),
 4424: 
 4425:     {SDSACert, SDSAKey, SDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SDSAOpts),
 4426:     {CDSACert, CDSAKey, CDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts,  CDSAOpts),
 4427: 
 4428:     AllSigAlgs1_2 = ssl_test_lib:all_1_2_sig_algs(),
 4429: 
 4430:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys,
 4431:                            [#{cert => SDSACert, key => SDSAKey},
 4432:                             #{cert => SRSACert, key => SRSAKey}]},
 4433:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4434:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4435:                           {cacerts, SRSACACerts ++ SDSACACerts}],
 4436:         client_config => [{certs_keys,
 4437:                            [#{cert => CDSACert, key => CDSAKey},
 4438:                             #{cert => CRSACert, key => CRSAKey}]},
 4439:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4440:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4441:                           {cacerts, CRSACACerts ++ CDSACACerts}]
 4442:        },
 4443:       {client_peer, SRSACert}, {server_peer, CRSACert}},
 4444:      {#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{cert => SDSACert, key => SDSAKey},
 4445:                                         #{cert => SRSACert, key => SRSAKey}]},
 4446:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4447:                           AllSigAlgs1_2,
 4448:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4449:                           {cacerts, SRSACACerts ++ SDSACACerts}],
 4450:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{cert => CDSACert, key => CDSAKey},
 4451:                                         #{cert => CRSACert, key => CRSAKey}]},
 4452:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4453:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4454:                           AllSigAlgs1_2,
 4455:                           {cacerts, CRSACACerts ++ CDSACACerts}]
 4456:        },
 4457:       {client_peer, SDSACert}, {server_peer, CDSACert}}];
 4458: test_config('dtlsv1.2', Config) ->
 4459:     #{server_config := SRSAPSSOpts,
 4460:       client_config := CRSAPSSOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_pss_pss, [], Config, "dtls_pss_pss_conf"),
 4461:     #{server_config := SRSAPSSRSAEOpts,
 4462:       client_config := CRSAPSSRSAEOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_pss_rsae, [], Config, "dtls_pss_rsae_conf"),
 4463: 
 4464:     {SRSAPSSCert, SRSAPSSKey, SRSAPSSCACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSAPSSOpts),
 4465:     {CRSAPSSCert, CRSAPSSKey, CRSAPSSCACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile,  CRSAPSSOpts),
 4466: 
 4467:     {SRSAPSSRSAECert, SRSAPSSRSAEKey, SRSAPSSRSAECACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSAPSSRSAEOpts),
 4468:     {CRSAPSSRSAECert, CRSAPSSRSAEKey, CRSAPSSRSAECACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSAPSSRSAEOpts),
 4469: 
 4470:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => SRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => SRSAPSSRSAEKey},
 4471:                                         #{certfile => SRSAPSSCert, keyfile => SRSAPSSKey}]},
 4472:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4473:                           {cacertfile, SRSAPSSCACerts}],
 4474:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => CRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => CRSAPSSRSAEKey},
 4475:                                         #{certfile => CRSAPSSCert, keyfile => CRSAPSSKey}]},
 4476:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4477:                           {signature_algs, [rsa_pss_pss_sha256]},
 4478:                           {cacertfile, CRSAPSSCACerts}]
 4479:        },
 4480:       {client_peer, pem_to_der_cert(SRSAPSSCert)}, {server_peer, pem_to_der_cert(CRSAPSSCert)}},
 4481:      {#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => SRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => SRSAPSSRSAEKey},
 4482:                                         #{certfile => SRSAPSSCert, keyfile => SRSAPSSKey}]},
 4483:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4484:                           {cacertfile, SRSAPSSRSAECACerts}],
 4485:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => CRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => CRSAPSSRSAEKey}]},
 4486:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha256]},
 4487:                           {cacertfile, CRSAPSSRSAECACerts}]
 4488:        },
 4489:       {client_peer, pem_to_der_cert(SRSAPSSRSAECert)}, {server_peer, pem_to_der_cert(CRSAPSSRSAECert)}}
 4490:     ];
 4491: test_config(_, Config) ->
 4492:     RSAConf1 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config),
 4493:     SRSA1Opts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, RSAConf1),
 4494:     CRSA1Opts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, RSAConf1),
 4495: 
 4496:     RSAConf2 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_1024_cert(Config),
 4497:     SRSA2Opts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_1024_opts, RSAConf2),
 4498:     CRSA2Opts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_1024_opts, RSAConf2),
 4499: 
 4500:     {SRSA1Cert, SRSA1Key, _SRSA1CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSA1Opts),
 4501:     {CRSA1Cert, CRSA1Key, _CRSA1CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSA1Opts),
 4502: 
 4503:     {SRSA2Cert, SRSA2Key, SRSA2CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSA2Opts),
 4504:     {CRSA2Cert, CRSA2Key, CRSA2CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSA2Opts),
 4505: 
 4506:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => SRSA2Cert, keyfile => SRSA2Key},
 4507:                                         #{certfile => SRSA1Cert, keyfile => SRSA1Key}]},
 4508:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4509:                           {cacertfile, SRSA2CACerts}],
 4510:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => CRSA2Cert, keyfile  => CRSA2Key},
 4511:                                         #{certfile => CRSA1Cert, keyfile => CRSA1Key}]},
 4512:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4513:                           {cacertfile, CRSA2CACerts}]
 4514:        }, {client_peer,  pem_to_der_cert(SRSA2Cert)}, {server_peer, pem_to_der_cert(CRSA2Cert)}}].
 4515: 
 4516: check_peercert(Socket, Cert) ->
 4517:     case ssl:peercert(Socket) of
 4518:         {ok, Cert} ->
 4519:             ok;
 4520:         {ok, Other} ->
 4521:             {error, {{expected, public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp)}, {got, public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Other, otp)}}}
 4522:     end.
 4523: 
 4524: 
 4525: eddsa_cert_chains() ->
 4526:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
 4527:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
 4528:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
 4529:                                 client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
 4530:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
 4531:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()}}).
 4532: 
 4533: ecdsa_cert_chains() ->
 4534:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf(),
 4535:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()],
 4536:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()},
 4537:                                 client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf(),
 4538:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()],
 4539:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()}}).
 4540: dsa_cert_chains() ->
 4541:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(1)}],
 4542:                                                   intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(2)}]],
 4543:                                                   peer =>  [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(3)}]
 4544:                                                  },
 4545:                                 client_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(3)}],
 4546:                                                   intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(2)}]],
 4547:                                                   peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(1)}]}}).
 4548: 
 4549: get_single_options(CertOptName, KeyOptName, CaOptName, Opts) ->
 4550:     CertOpt = proplists:get_value(CertOptName, Opts),
 4551:     KeyOpt = proplists:get_value(KeyOptName, Opts),
 4552:     CaOpt = proplists:get_value(CaOptName, Opts),
 4553:     {CertOpt, KeyOpt, CaOpt}.
 4554: 
 4555: pem_to_der_cert(Pem) ->
 4556:     [{'Certificate', Der, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Pem),
 4557:     Der.
 4558: 
 4559: test_sha1_cert_conf('tlsv1.3'= Version, RSA, ECDSA, Config) ->
 4560:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, ECDSA, Config, ecdsa_sha1),
 4561:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, rsa_pkcs1_sha1);
 4562: test_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, ECDSA, Config) when Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4563:                                                       Version == 'dtlsv1.2' ->
 4564:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, {sha, rsa}),
 4565:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, ECDSA, Config, {sha, ecdsa});
 4566: test_sha1_cert_conf(Version,RSA,_,Config) ->
 4567:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, undefined).
 4568: 
 4569: run_sha1_cert_conf('tlsv1.3', #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) ->
 4570:     SigAlgs = [%% ECDSA
 4571:                ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 4572:                ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 4573:                ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 4574:                %% RSASSA-PSS
 4575:                rsa_pss_pss_sha512,
 4576:                rsa_pss_pss_sha384,
 4577:                rsa_pss_pss_sha256,
 4578:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,
 4579:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha384,
 4580:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
 4581:                %% EDDSA
 4582:                eddsa_ed25519,
 4583:                eddsa_ed448
 4584:               ],
 4585:     IncludeLegacyAlg =  SigAlgs ++ [LegacyAlg],
 4586:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert([{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  SigAlgs} | ClientOpts],
 4587:                              [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config, handshake_failure),
 4588:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ClientOpts],
 4589:                                     [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config);
 4590: 
 4591: run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) when Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4592:                                                                                                                  Version == 'dtlsv1.2' ->
 4593:     SigAlgs =  [%% SHA2
 4594:                 {sha512, ecdsa},
 4595:                 {sha512, rsa},
 4596:                 {sha384, ecdsa},
 4597:                 {sha384, rsa},
 4598:                 {sha256, ecdsa},
 4599:                 {sha256, rsa},
 4600:                 {sha224, ecdsa},
 4601:                 {sha224, rsa}],
 4602:     IncludeLegacyAlg = SigAlgs ++ [LegacyAlg],
 4603:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test( [{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ClientOpts],
 4604:                              [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config);
 4605: run_sha1_cert_conf(_, #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) ->
 4606:     NVersion = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 4607:     SigOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(LegacyAlg, NVersion),
 4608:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts] ++ SigOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 4609:
